The pictures are very good also. the camera performed well, sometimes underwater it was hard to see the screen, but for the price I definetly recommend this camera....camera comes with a little brush to make sure there is no sand or hair where you shut the camera, to keep a watertight seal...good idea!

Reviews.Title: Very good camera
Reviews.Author: wa
Reviews.Content: Camera is awesome so far. Took it to the beach and it shot very clear and bright photos underwater. The video was very clear underwater as well. I was surprised how nice the shots was above water with no water droplets in the photos. Good camera. I bought a warranty plan with the purchase, I think its best to with outdoor devices. Got it at B&H; Photo, needed the fast shipping, Amazon didn't have it in stock.

Reviews.Title: beach perfect camera!
Reviews.Author: PK "pk"
Reviews.Content: this was my answer to not taking the dslr to the beach and not buying a disposable underwater camera.it was great!  yes the images are not perfect but its been under water and sand...the fact that it still works is a miracle.  totally loved it and glad we have it!

Reviews.Title: My new favorite camera
Reviews.Author: Not happy
Reviews.Content: ***(I don't know about that "Not Happy" name there.  That was from another review and I can't see how to change it.  I AM happy with the camera.)This camera takes lovely pictures, with 16mps.  I do wish the zoom was a little bigger, but for kayaking, it is awesome!!  I got some great underwater shots of a shipwreck and beautiful rocks in Lake Superior.  Can't wait to take it snorkeling!  Battery life was awesome!  Went all day on one charge, taking at least 150 shots over about 8 hours.  I will have another battery before the next adventure like that.  (I just came from using AA batteries in a wornout Olympus!  I am ecstatic about the battery!)For the price, I feel I got a great little waterproof camera!  I used a neck strap and keep the camera inside my PFD pocket or a shirt.  Perfect.  Matches my orange kayak too.  ;-)

Reviews.Title: Great camera for the money
Reviews.Author: Rhett Hughes
Reviews.Content: If you are a photo/video/audio-phile, then this camera is not for you.  However, if you want good pictures for memories or to make some nice framed pictures to hang on the wall without worrying about your camera, then this one is for you.  I bought it for Hawaii because I knew we would be snorkeling.  It was perfect for that endeavor. Disclaimer: it was not the only camera I took on the trip.  I have a Nikon DSLR, and that did most of the work taking pictures.  This was just so nice to have for the underwater pictures and for me to keep in a pocket when going out to dinner, or for my wife to carry around when at Pearl Harbor, etc, etc.  The optical zoom is ok at 4X, and surprisingly, the digital zoom is really not that bad (whereas often it gets too pixelated with point and shoot cameras).  I gave this a 5 star not because it is a 5 star camera by itself, but taken together as a whole: build, weight (super light), size (very thin), waterproof to 16 feet, shockproof, ease of use, picture quality, video quality, and especially price, then it is definitely 5 stars.

Reviews.Title: Exactly what I wanted
Reviews.Author: Joe
Reviews.Content: I wanted an inexpensive camera that I could take on vacations, use in the water, and not have to worry about.  This does all that, and takes excellent pictures too.  I'm not a professional photographer, and my thoughts regarding picture quality are that the only people who might complain are those who are used to cameras costing hundreds more.  These pictures are sharper than what I got with my old kodak instashare, which cost more than 2X as much.  The camera is incredibly user friendly, has already taken a bit of a beating (a hike through some water falls where it had a few encounters with rocks), and all is still working perfectly.  Battery life is great, lasted a whole day... it's small, it's light... the price is perfect.  I'm a happy customer.

Reviews.Title: Awesome when wet
Reviews.Author: jillich
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera to take out with me when I go kayaking, having tired dropping our other everyday shooter, a micro 4/3, into the drybag and carefully using it out on the often choppy Intracoastal waters. I've been skeptical about waterproof cameras, but I have to say, I'm pretty pleased with this little camera. The image quality is better than I expected, and it performs well in water. The menu system is a little simplified... I'm accustomed to my Nikon dslr and the control I have over everything, but it's a point and click, so I wasn't expecting much out of that. For the price of the camera, you get a lot of bang for your buck. I've used it a few times, and have followed the cleaning instructions pretty closely, and so far, so good. Aside from the simplified menu, which I consider a negative, there is SOME fogging on the LCD screen, but that evaporates once the camera's been in a dry environment. When using this camera in the water, it's a good idea to remember that water may dry on the lens, so wiping it or rinsing it prior to taking a shot may be a good idea; I learned this when some of my shots had water spots. That's more user error than anything else, however.

Reviews.Title: BEST BANG FOR YOUR BUCK!
Reviews.Author: Olivia
Reviews.Content: I'm participating in our area Tough Mudder event next month and wanted to take along a waterproof camera. I took a waterproof disposable last year to Warrior Dash, and it worked out fine, but the problem with the old school wind-up cameras, if you accidentally hit the picture button, there goes a waste of one photo gone of your hand or blurry shirt or whatever!So I decided to invest in a digital waterproof camera. I already have an AWESOME Canon for my regular everyday and special events, so I didn't want to spend so much on a camera that I would only use for my obstacle marathons and beach/pool-side outings.After reading up on a few on the lower costs models (I really wanted the waterproof Canon, but just couldn't pay that price!), it came down to the Waterproof Kodak Easyshare and the Waterproof Panasonic Lumix. Both had decent Pros and Cons Feedback. I opted for the Lumix because come down to it...I just didn't want to deal with carrying AA batteries. REALLY?!...batteries! I'm all about the lithium rechargeable batteries.I took the camera to a pool party this past weekend, and was a little hesitant to dip the camera and take under water shots, but hey...that's why I bought it...to test it out! So I did it....and the camera worked out GREAT! The under water shots of the kids were awesome! I thought there would be water spots when taking photos in the pool (splashing kids), but none! The battery and card section is sealed tight! I made sure to keep it locked and let the camera dry off before opening it to retrieve the memory card.I tried out the video, and the videos came out clear and fine.Now there are some feedbacks on this camera about the quality of the photos. Honestly....the photos were nice and clear. Not great like my non-waterproof Canon, but I bought it for the ruggedness and waterproof ability; to be able to not worry about dropping it in the pool or kids splashing nearby.There are also feedbacks here that state their camera isn't waterproof. I think that those individuals may have received a defect that may have came off the production line. But those are few here and there that comes out defective straight out of the warehouse.This being my first time use of it, I definitely LOVE the camera! We'll see what I have to say in an update, when I take it with me on my Tough Mudder event.**OCTOBER 2 UPDATE**WATERPROOF! MUDPROOF! SHOCKPROOF! EVERYTHING PROOF!!!So I just came back and survived Tough Mudder! This little camera is ALL AROUND TOUGH!!!! I honestly thought that at one point mud would seep through. But I waded through mud, jumped into muddy waters, swam through even more gross water, and the camera kept turning on every time I took it out of my Spi-belt to take photos. I do have to say that some photos came out smudgy only because it was hard to clear out the lens from all the mud and I was so dirty and muddy that wiping it off on me wasn't helping. Plus it was sometimes hard to see on the picture viewer only because of the mud. But the point of this all, is that the camera took pictures way better than a disposable could ever, and I was able to take video also! AND it survived TOUGH MUDDER!! Now if you don't know what event I'm talking about, look it up! When you do check it out, you'll probably think, "yeah right!" But believe me...this camera is TOUGHER and more rugged than it looks! I bumped it up from 4 stars to 5!!!

Reviews.Title: Very Happy
Reviews.Author: Quasar2010
Reviews.Content: Purchased this for my adult daughter. She is very happy with it. She has used it in the rain, underwater in salt water and just in normal use. The pictures have been sharp and even the ones underwater were good, given the reduced light level. She says it feels well made and is easy to operate. She is small and finds the camera fits her hands very well. She would definitely recommend the camera.Update 11/26/13 -- This camera is still going strong. It has been used extensively around and in salt water as well as just rain and dampness. No issues at all. The pictures are nice (even the ones underwater) and the camera is the right size to take anywhere. Still a definite recommendation.

Reviews.Title: Outstanding value! Loads of fun!
Reviews.Author: BooBooMom
Reviews.Content: Bought this for an upcoming trip to Orlando. Hacked around with it in the pool, and got some great stills and video. This little camera is great! I also take price/value relationship into consideration on my reviews. For $140 this was a tremendous value. I'll update this review after dragging it through the paces at Disney World and the obligatory water parks. But so far I'm really pleased.

Reviews.Title: great water proof camera
Reviews.Author: A. Leavitt
Reviews.Content: I bought this underwater camera for my husband to replace a previous one that died. we took it with us to Hawaii and got some amazing pictures both in and out of the water! very light weight and durable. just be sure you read the fine print about how long it can be submerged and all the other limits (available on amazon.com pages for the camera).

Reviews.Title: Love this camera!
Reviews.Author: lovemyamazon "amazloyal"
Reviews.Content: For the price, I don't know why some reviews are so hard on the camera and picture quality. This is our favorite camera. There are probably better cameras but you'll probably spend a LOT more. We think it takes great photos and I've had some amazing underwater photos and even underwater videos. I love taking it to the pool and not having to worry about it getting wet or dropping it (which I've done). My husband and I both recommend this camera.

Reviews.Title: Great product for what it is. Performs as advertised and expected
Reviews.Author: Joshua D. Oconnor
Reviews.Content: We have had this camera for a few months and have used it in a variety of conditions. Operation is simple and intuitive.Photography in low light is lackluster. This should be expected with the lens it is equipped with. Color can seem a bit flat at times. These are the compromises you need to make to own a waterproof camera this cheap. MOST of the pictures turn out quite good. Some are stellar. Action shots in water are amazing...As a quick and dirty, packable, tossable camera at a great price point ($130 when I purchased) it will accomplish 90% of the tasks you will ask it to with ease.I take it fishing, camping, canoeing and hiking. I let my 4 year old use it on occaision and have taken pictures in heavy surf. After trying for a half hour took a picture inside the curl of a breaking wave! Also documented my son's first attempts at body surfing (4 year old) in still and video. A 16mp camera, that can do all that, in a tidy package for under $150. Can't be beat.

Reviews.Title: Very pleased with this camera and the process to get it
Reviews.Author: Christopher
Reviews.Content: Very pleased with this camera and the process through Amazon to acquire it. I ordered the camera on Sunday for the trip my wife and I took to Mexico. It arrived on Tuesday in time for our Wednesday departure. It took great pictures and it was very easy to use. Thank you!

Reviews.Title: Very Nice Affordable All Purpose Camera
Reviews.Author: jbordeno
Reviews.Content: I've only had this camera a couple weeks now but so far I love it.  I got this camera because it was an affordable water camera.  I've used this camera swimming and river rafting and it has with stood that so far and captured great pictures.  The only thing about taking pictures in water is be careful about water drops getting on lens because it will come out in pictures.  This camera has A LOT of features that I am still learning and one of them I really have enjoyed is the auto timer.Sometimes a picture will come out kind of "hazy" but I think that is because it wasn't focused yet.  The pictures look great on the computer but I haven't printed any yet to see how they look, hopefully I shouldn't have rated this camera 4 stars instead of 5 for that reason.But overall a pretty great camera that will be great for water sports and any sports that are out in the dirt like ATV riding!

Reviews.Title: Great camera for taking on Vacation
Reviews.Author: J. Rojas "furstbarto"
Reviews.Content: I have had the came for about 2 weeks. I bought right before going on a week long trip in Mexico.I took it to the beach, the pool without major issues. Picture quality was good for an underwater camera. Note that water has to be crystal clear for underwater pictures. The main reason i bought it was because i would be in the water most of the time, and I did not want to worry about getting the camera wet. I pretty much kept the camera in the water the entire time; it was in my pocket while i was in the pool. Most of the reviews I read seemed to complain about the camera breaking after a few days. I read the instructions and cleaned it each night to ensure it did not get any sand in the battery opening; this would cause water to get in the camera. After the 4th day the camera's screen got a little foggy, but it usually disappeared within seconds of being outside the water.Pros:Descent picture qualityWaterproofGreat extra features: Panoramic, Tilt shift (miniature), and other basic settings.Re-chargeable batteryLong battery lifeGood price $160Cons:A little bulkier than a regular digital cameraIf there are any other issues i will update this review.

Reviews.Title: Still working great after 2 years
Reviews.Author: R. Heng
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera 2 years ago and used it on white water rafting trips, snorkeling, boating, and lake trips.  Remember to let it dry out after using it in water because it may fog up.

Reviews.Title: I ABSOLUTELY LOVE THIS CAMERA
Reviews.Author: Ann S. Prather Speck
Reviews.Content: I have two very nice large cameras and this one. The pictures turn out fabulous AND it does work underwater too-nice photos. I cannot tell anyone how much I love this little camera and I have countless friends who bought it because my photos turn out so nice. The zoon is fabulous for a pocket camera and the color is really nice. I bet I have taken 1,000's of pictures which most all turned out nice. The photos enlarge well and no one can believe they are from my little small Lumix pocket camera. I recently took it to Saint Lucia for two weeks, instead of my larger cameras. ALL the photos turned out so nice, I put together a very nice picture book from one of the man sources on line. It looks like I went to a bookstore and purchased it, as one friend said when she saw it. YOU WILL LOVE LOVE LOVE THIS CAMERA and it WORKS SO WELL. Has several setting and during this trip, I took many pictures from our moving car-all turned out great. I have taken it to the beach, on out boat, used it on cloudy days, in the rain, in bright light, in sunlight and at night-all turned out nice. One of the best little cameras I have ever had-no, it is THE BEST SMALL CAMERA I HAVE EVER HAD! It is wonderful!

Reviews.Title: Broke the first time I used it. Now I ...
Reviews.Author: Christa Showstead
Reviews.Content: Broke the first time I used it. Now I get to contact Panasonic and see if they will fix it. Don't buy. Not worth the hassle.

Reviews.Title: lens fogs in humid weather and unable to download photos to computer
Reviews.Author: Deborah L. Obrien "pickyrif"
Reviews.Content: This is my second Lumix, and it has issues, as did the first one.  First, the lens fogged up continually when I tried to take photos on a humid day to the point that I stopped taking photos.  Another person with me had the same camera and the same problem.  That seemed to resolve itself, but now I cannot download the photos to my computer.  Called technical help, who was helpful, and was told I need to send in the camera b/se it needs repairs.  This is the first time I've used this camera and this shouldn't happen.

Reviews.Title: Best camera
Reviews.Author: Tiffany Campos
Reviews.Content: I love this camera! It works great for everything! it fits in my back pocket easily and takes amazing photos. If you use it in water make sure to get the underwater accessory kit. It is just a flotation strap but it keeps your camera from sinking or running off. Anti-shake on this is great I love that I can be in a moving vehicle and take a picture that turns out great. Plus with 2 kids who don't sit still I need action shots and this camera delivers.

Reviews.Title: Worth it
Reviews.Author: Diana Nichols
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera because I needed to take one with me while I ran a muddy obstical ridden half marathon. It survived. It is tough, no mud got in to the inner workings.The only thing I didn't like is you have to keep the screen clean or you don't know what the photos look like or if the lense was clean untill you looked at it later.I recomend this to anyone who is learning photography and might drop or get it dirty, to any one running a muddy/dirty race and wants live in the action shots and lastly everyone else. It is an amazing camera. The pictures turned out amazing.My recomendation for use is put a screen cover on the screen to protect that and maybe one on the lense to protect that as well.

Reviews.Title: Great waterproof camera
Reviews.Author: DB
Reviews.Content: Did not expect too much when buying this, especially when I have pro-dSLR camera gear at home, but this camera is great for what I bought it for. Use it all summer long at the pool and beach. So far no issues but I am careful to ensure it is clean before I take it in the water.

Reviews.Title: Poor quality
Reviews.Author: Sujay
Reviews.Content: As a compact, waterproof, tough camera, it will probably do what it is 'supposed' to do: allow you to carry it in any conditions and take pictures. You'll come back from your adventure and be thoroughly disappointed with those pictures, though. To give you an idea, they are much worse than any smartphone cameras of today, about as good as a decent digital camera from 2002, and way worse than a GoPro 3.I took it whitewater kayaking in Pennsylvania, and would rather use screen grabs from the GoPro footage, than the photos from this camera. I am a hobbyist photographer, and use a GoPro 3+, a Nikon P7100 with a dive rated housing, and a Nikon D7000.I thought this camera would work great to carry along in my pocket and take slightly zoomed in pictures of kayakers surfing, since the GoPro is too wide. Turns out the quality is so bad that I wouldn't even want to show anyone those pictures: the beauty of the scene just wasn't captured. Panasonic really needs to up their game. I understand that this class of cameras is not supposed to take GREAT pictures, but they need to be acceptable at least. Buy this camera only if you don't care about the quality of your pictures, and just need evidence that you were on vacation. Returning it today.The sample customer images on Amazon actually look pretty good in that small format, but even in bright sunshine the quality is poor, I assure you.

Reviews.Title: Great for underwater usage
Reviews.Author: akahearoltz
Reviews.Content: The only setback is megapixel quality, and I also haven't figured out to get rid of the water warning at the beginning, but at least it works.

Reviews.Title: Worked out well as a gift
Reviews.Author: Shena
Reviews.Content: Got this camera for my boyfriend whom has a knack for breaking cameras (2 in two years!)  I love the fact it is designed to withstand drops and water submersion.  So far so good, it also takes decent quality video at concerts (after doing research I found out mono recording sound was supposed to sound better.)  It arrived timely and like new.

Reviews.Title: Loved it while it worked
Reviews.Author: Stephanie
Reviews.Content: This was a great camera when it was working. I took it in the ocean and a lake and it took great pictures and video. Unfortunately, last month I took it to Mexico and sometime between getting on a scuba diving boat and getting the camera out to use it, it broke. I took great care of it, always rinsing it and drying it thoroughly, making sure it didn't get bumped or anything, but something internal must have happened and now every time it takes a picture it has these lines across it. A real shame!

Reviews.Title: Very Happy with Purchase
Reviews.Author: Tracy
Reviews.Content: Camera took amazing underwater photos. I am not an avid photographer and really have no idea what I am doing. So, it was really the camera doing all the work-especially underwater. I was just clicking away and they all came out great. I am very happy that I decided to purchase an actual camera versus the disposable cameras. I figured by the time I developed all the film, it would be more cost effective to just buy a real camera. Plus, with disposable cameras, you really have no idea if the pictures are coming out well until you have already paid for the development. Also took amazing pictures out of the water as well.

Reviews.Title: New purchase
Reviews.Author: Vincent Etzel
Reviews.Content: I have had Lumix products in the past and like the simplicity of the functions. I bought this one for my Boy Scout troop historian because of the waaterproof feature so he can document our outdoor activites. It just arrived so we haven't had a chance to put it through the paces but if it holds up as well as my previous units I don't anticipate any issues.

Reviews.Title: quality of pictures taken is bad!
Reviews.Author: Ryne "hunter"
Reviews.Content: Most of pictures I took with this camera have bad quality, especially if taken with high iso, I can see quite much noise in the pictures and more often a blur. The colors of pictures are not so bright and less contrasting. Even in daylight the quality of captured pictures is not so good.

Reviews.Title: Awesome!
Reviews.Author: CALIN8V
Reviews.Content: Just got back from a trip with a lot of in-water/out of water fun.  We never even tested it out at home before we left.  Just as easy to use as you would expect.  Out of water shots were just as clear as underwater shots.

Reviews.Title: LED stopped working after 2nd use.
Reviews.Author: Howard A. Gorder
Reviews.Content: Took this camera particularly to use for "cave tubing" on rivers through mountain caves in Belize, Central America, as well as for use Snorkeling out in the Gulf of Mexico out on the Cayes offshore of Belize.  Worked well on 2 outings, then the LED stopped working making the camera useless since you can't see what you are doing without the use of the LED screen on the back of the camera.I did rinse the camera off after use in fresh water river during the cave tubing outing, and soaked the camera in fresh water per MFR recommendations after using it and never exceeding 5' depth during the snorkeling outing.  Thankfully the memory card saved the priceless nice photo's I took with this camera, however, the camera will have to be sent back under MFR warranty since it is not usable without the LED.Glad the pictures and the SD card saved the pictures, though am disappointed in it not working after just 2 outings and no misuse!

Reviews.Title: LOVE it
Reviews.Author: Janet Fouts "Social Media Coach"
Reviews.Content: This little camera is super easy to use and the display is large enough to see pretty clearly underwater. We took it diving off the Mexican coast and got great pics. We never had any issues with battery life as some have said, all good and a smart buy for not a lot of money.

Reviews.Title: AMAZING
Reviews.Author: Meredith
Reviews.Content: I took this camera on a trip to Australia. It was great for travel because I did not have to worry much about getting it wet during my travel. I took it snorkeling in the Great Barrier Reef and also in hot springs in Iceland and have never had a problem. LOVE IT!

Reviews.Title: splash resistant only
Reviews.Author: Thomas J. Sullivan
Reviews.Content: I got this in the fall of 2013 and took it down the grand canyon on a rafting trip.  It was splashed with lots of muddy water.  No problems.  The quality of the images was fairly good if you remembered to wipe off the muddy water.  This winter of 2014  I took it to Hawaii and took it out in the light surf at the beach. It died. Just cell phone pictures for the rest of the trip for me.  When I got back I sent it in for warranty repairs and received a recondition unit in a few weeks at no charge.  My experience would say this is ok for non vigorous water exposure.  Do not jump in the pool with it, do not take it in the surf.  Calm flat shallow water it was fine.  Service was fine.

Reviews.Title: Leaked the first time it was used.
Reviews.Author: T. Brown
Reviews.Content: This was my first "waterproof" camera. I was so nervous about actually using it while snorkeling that I waited a year before trying it.  The first time I took the camera into the water I was still very nervous so I made sure the camera door was shut and sealed properly. The camera functioned fine for about 30 minutes, then it stopped working, the screen went black, and it could not be turned on. I opened the camera and found drops of water inside; not a lot of water but enough to fry the electronics and render the camera useless. Fortunately the memory card was not damaged so I was able to save my first and last underwater pictures taken with this camera.  This camera is a waste of your time.

Reviews.Title: Waterproof...for a while
Reviews.Author: angie
Reviews.Content: Bought this in December 2012 for a sailing trip in Grenada.  I took some amazing video of sea turtles while snorkeling.  Over the summer of 2013, many fun pix in Jamaica and at home in the pool.  Fast forward to December 2013, snorkeling in the Virgin Islands, my husband took it down about 5 feet to get a close up of a fish and *poof* it's not waterproof anymore.  Never did get it to turn back on after that.  Fortunately the weeks worth of pictures on the memory card were fine, but we spent the next week with only our iPhones for cameras. I did buy the "Square Trade Warranty" for it, and they reimbursed me 100% of the purchase price.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Natalia Rodriguez
Reviews.Content: Works great under water! I took it to the beach and underwater images are beatiful, nice colors, and it even has an internal memory in case you forget the memory card as I did :)

Reviews.Title: Takes okay pictures
Reviews.Author: Denise Ruzicka
Reviews.Content: The camera does work well underwater but it does not take very good pictures and it is difficult to tell if pictures that you are taking are in focus or not.

Reviews.Title: Worked great, until we tried it in WATER.
Reviews.Author: Literate1
Reviews.Content: The camera worked fine on dry land. However, despite following instructions to the *letter*, it began leaking within 5 minutes of beginning to use it in the ocean on a snorkeling trip. Water started to show up behind the screen and condensation formed as well. Took it back to our hotel and followed the instructions for cleaning, drying it, and waiting until it seemed to be dry before opening the case... All as instructed in the manual. After opening it, water dripped out, the screen still had condensation, and the battery appeared corroded slightly. The camera no longer functioned at all. Photos we took before the failure were fine, and we successfully transferred them (there were only a few) to a laptop. The camera will no longer operate at all. Luckily, we bought ours from Target and I sprung for the 2-year extended warranty, so I believe we will be receiving a refund of our purchase price. Would NOT recommend this camera after using it. I loved the idea of it, and it took nice photos while it lasted. But it was an absolute failure in the water, and I would not buy a Panasonic camera -- waterproof or otherwise -- as a result of this experience.

Reviews.Title: Bad product
Reviews.Author: joshua a siler
Reviews.Content: The camera is not waterproofed as advertised. It leaked and fogged up after 3 uses. Would not reccommend to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Leaked
Reviews.Author: Geoff Wade
Reviews.Content: Sadly, water now gets into view screen after 2 years, it still takes pictures but I won't risk it again.

Reviews.Title: Excelent Cost and benefit
Reviews.Author: Luiz Hippolyto Correia
Reviews.Content: There are several cameras waterproof, but it meets the need for a consistent and excellent quality cost; recommend everyone this excellent product;

Reviews.Title: Not as good...
Reviews.Author: Qbanita LA
Reviews.Content: I ended up sending this camera back.  The pictures on my Android were much better than this camera, surprisingly.  Perhaps it was just this particular camera...

Reviews.Title: Overall Good Camera
Reviews.Author: Clinton Serr
Reviews.Content: We Decided on This Camera For The Megapixels.I took this Fishing in The Muskegon River,February Weather and Fell In submerging The Camera.I'm Fine and The Camera Works Perfect.A 4GB  Memory card Will Give You Plenty Of Picture Space!Also Fishing in Michigan in Winter is Dangerous :)

Reviews.Title: lumix camera
Reviews.Author: mark
Reviews.Content: good in situations that warrant a waterproof camera pics are ok  only use when I am fishing should have looked at others

Reviews.Title: Ok Picture quality but very easy to handle
Reviews.Author: KC
Reviews.Content: I wanted a basic point and shoot camera for my kayak/lake trips. this serves the purpose. I don't like the battery, probably should get an off the market battery for longer battery life.Picture quality is ok, I am not looking to take print quality pictures just casual pictures to save.Good camera for the price.

Reviews.Title: Best use of $130!
Reviews.Author: K. S.
Reviews.Content: I am so happy with this little camera! I bought it to take on my honeymoon and have used it in and out of water many times since. It takes great pictures! It is not good at low light images, but for the price I paid for it and the quality of underwater shots I don't even care!

Reviews.Title: digital camera
Reviews.Author: Edivaldo Jose Bezerra
Reviews.Content: was the machine that I was waiting for, modern, water proof, arrived at time and I hope buy one more to my wife

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: jessica clauss
Reviews.Content: I love this camera.  Very durable. Takes great underwater pictures.  Love the snow mode. Great investment, looking forward to a long camera life!!

Reviews.Title: Excellent Tough Camera
Reviews.Author: Thomas "tomsde"
Reviews.Content: What's good about it:  I bought this camera to take into environments where moisture and dirt can be worrisome for your photographic equipment.  I've used it in the swimming pool and on rainy days and taken it camping  I've dropped it with no damage.  It takes excellent pictures and 720 p video.  It has a variety of nice shooting modes including "Happy" which produces richer colors without being over the top.  It shoots a variety of aspect ratios for still pictures, the full range from 16:9 to 1:1.  I liked to shoot square images sometimes because it hearkens back to my first camera, a Kodak Brownie which shot medium format square photos--and is already popular for retro look applications like Instagram on your tablet or smart phone.  It is Eye-Fi compatible, so one can offload pictures without removing the card or using a cable.  It also has a fun auto panorama mode which allows you to create panoramas in camera by panning the camera.  it also takes good underwater pictures and has a greater depth rating than some of it's competitors for the same price point.  It's high megapixel count makes it possible to create high quality large prints or have more latitude for cropping out unwanted areas.What I don't like:  muddly looking view finer that's difficult to see in bright light and no optical viewfinder to offset that.  Secondly some of the paint has worn off the silver handgrip--which is made of plastic.  The third thing is that battery life is middling.  It takes a small proprietary battery.All in all a good 2nd camera for the money for when you don't want to take your more expensive camera out in all sorts of weather.  I got it at a good price.  My recommendation is to have a spare battery and make sure you have a full charge if you're going to a wet environment.  If you need to change the camera's battery out when in the field make sure it's dry, your hands are dry,  and there is no sand anywhere before opening the battery compartment as it could cause damage to your camera.  All things considered I'd buy this camera again and have even considered upgrading to their wifi, gps, high definition video model.

Reviews.Title: Not great but it works
Reviews.Author: Oklahoma Wind Sprite
Reviews.Content: I have had this camera around the world and back, it takes a licking and keeps on ticking as the old slogan goes,  I bought it as a back up camera, The pictures are not quick as clear as expected but as a back up camera it fine

Reviews.Title: Excellent Little Camera
Reviews.Author: BigAl
Reviews.Content: This camera is fantastic! I took a trip to Africa recently and got some really great shots from it, some turned out even better than the ones on my fancy expensive Canon SLR! I would definitely recommend this to anyone. It is small, easy to carry, easy to use, and takes great pictures. I have yet to figure out how to take pictures under water with it because they seem to always come out a little blurry, but I think those instances were because there wasn't enough lighting.

Reviews.Title: Love this camera
Reviews.Author: D. Lewis
Reviews.Content: We have been across this country and about a dozen other and taken some great shots. Good battery life and pictures that come out good under almost any conditions. Sure its not a thousand dollar camera but some of the picture you can take with this cam will make you forget that.

Reviews.Title: Great - However
Reviews.Author: Robert Taylor
Reviews.Content: This is a great camera however it claims to be waterproof and maybe it is. After a year of use without problem I just happened to take it along on a cruise and while skin diving (all latches/seals closed per instructions) for 30 minutes in a depth of 12 feet moisture entered the camera and that was nearly the end of it. I sent it to the manufacturer and they warrant the equipment except when it is a moisture issue. SO I bought another one but it will not be submerged in water. I use this for work constantly taking 60 photos 5 days a week . . . its awesome.

Reviews.Title: It's an okay
Reviews.Author: Angel
Reviews.Content: I purchased this one for my wife it's ok for an all around camera for outside and in pools or anywhere your around water.

Reviews.Title: Gift for my wife, she really likes it.
Reviews.Author: Ed
Reviews.Content: My wife took a photo class, and finds all the features with her camera work well. We go onto our river a lot, so she will enjoy the waterproof feature. The camera zooms really close and takes very sharp, clear pictures.

Reviews.Title: Never worked
Reviews.Author: Merf55 "Merf55"
Reviews.Content: I tried several different SD cards and none of them worked with this camera. Disappointed because I bought it for my honeymoon and didn't have enough time to get a new one.

Reviews.Title: Great Utility Sport Camera
Reviews.Author: Sarge the Poet
Reviews.Content: Hardened, water resistant produces fair quality pictures and can be carried without serious encumbrance so it is always to hand when needed. Great for documenting Computer build activities and for outdoor adventure travel. This Purchase was as a gift which shows how highly I rate this camera.

Reviews.Title: Poor pictures quality, not water tight
Reviews.Author: Arlena
Reviews.Content: This waterproof camera is 'okay'. I bought it to use on my trip to the Riviera Maya because I knew I was going to be doing a lot of snorkeling. The quality of the pictures out of the water was not very good, if you didn't hold the camera totally still the photos will come out very blurry, particularly the face of the subjects; even thought I always made sure to close the camera battery compartment tightly, starting on the 4th or 5th time I used the camera under water, water had already gotten inside of the camera (in the lenses), so a water mark would show on the pictures taken outside the water. Really, not very good performance for a camera. I would recommend you spend a little more and get a better camera, particularly, if you care about the image quality.

Reviews.Title: Great Little Camera
Reviews.Author: Diane
Reviews.Content: This was a gift for my nephew who was going on a Boy Scout High Adventure off the coast of Florida.  He got the best pictures on that trip and loves the camera.

Reviews.Title: Broke after one use
Reviews.Author: Josh B
Reviews.Content: Followed the directions to the T, but water still entered the camera causing it to break. Perhaps it was just a faulty camera, but I won't be getting another.

Reviews.Title: durability isnt good everything else yes
Reviews.Author: Gabriel Ramírez Cruz
Reviews.Content: i bough this camara no even two years ago and  now is not working. the camera take great pic but durability is ok, and i dont used  much.

Reviews.Title: This works great.
Reviews.Author: Andrew J Klatt
Reviews.Content: Only have used it is saltwater and snorkeling and it worked great.  Awesome quality of shots and easy to use while swimming.

Reviews.Title: freeze-proof?
Reviews.Author: howard l.
Reviews.Content: The TS20 is small, thin, stylish, and good looking for this type of camera.  Plus, it's cheaper than all the other high end brand "tough" cameras...but the specs are a little dicey.I've seen a panasonic web page that lists the TS20(FT20) as only operating down to 32 deg F (not freeze-proof) and a different page that claims the TS20 can go down to 14 deg F...although it doesn't mention the operating temps on the specs page.Maybe the first version of this camera wasn't freeze-proof and the second version is, but, if you're taking this camera up to the mtns in winter (or have low winter home temps), you may want to make sure which version you're getting.

Reviews.Title: Nice little camera.
Reviews.Author: El "Rosely"
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my boyfriend, a whitewater kayaker and raft guide. He thinks the interface is a bit difficult to use, but good for basic use, and it's definitely waterproof!

Reviews.Title: Not a bad buy
Reviews.Author: S. Knowlton
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for a trip I was going on. I haven't used it underwater yet. The zoom is not the greatest compared to my other cameras . But the fact that it is waterproof makes it less stressful taking it near water areas. I simply hook the Case Logic TBC-302 Ultra Compact Camera Case with Storage carrying case I bought for it to my life vest and take it kayaking with me. I took some great wide angle shots of the lake with worry free aggravation of what if I drop it or if it gets wet for any reason. I haven't used any of the other features yet other than the Panorama function. Which was easy to use.  I only gave it 4 stars because I haven't tried it underwater.

Reviews.Title: I've Recommended to Friends After Using
Reviews.Author: Kevin
Reviews.Content: Takes great pictures. I've had it in the water, fresh water springs and salt water bay and gulf, and it's done great. The pictures in day light are really excellent. Recommend this camera highly.

Reviews.Title: Aweosme!
Reviews.Author: Fredrick Zollar
Reviews.Content: I love this camera. I love that it is waterproof and can take pictures under water. The picture quality is very good and can zoom pretty far. It is also a good price.

Reviews.Title: Not long lasting.  Bad lens
Reviews.Author: Beth Z
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for my husband last year for Christmas.  It has turned out to be a bad buy.  The camera door is not longer water tight, so we cannot submerge without getting water in the memory card.  When we take pictures, they often come out foggy or with drips on them.  We have to constantly be cleaning and wiping the lens.  It has not turned out to be rugged or to have a non-fogging lens.  Do not buy.

Reviews.Title: Broke after first use!
Reviews.Author: TBT
Reviews.Content: I purchased the camera to take with me to Saipan.  The camera leaked the first time it was used underwater (after having testing it at home in the sink).  I followed the directions precisely,  brushing the flimsy silicon seal on the inside of the locking mechanism indoors using the provided cleaning brush and checking for any sand, dirt or debris that may have come in contact with the seal.  Once I was sure that nothing was on or near the seal I closed the compartment and made sure it was locked.  When you turn the camera on and select the underwater mode it reminds you to make sure it is clean and locked and to only use it at the proper depth, all of which I did prior to heading to the beach per the directions in the users manual.After coming home and placing the still locked camera in a bowl of clean water to clean the salt off per directions, letting it air dry for several hours I opened the camera and noticed water inside the SD card slot and around the battery.  Dismayed, I let the camera dry for two days with the door open and the battery and sd card removed (the photos were fine).  Once I replaced the card and battery and tried to turn the camera on it would no longer write to the SD card.  Since this was the only camera I brought with me for my two month trip, I let it dry out some more in the hopes it would work.  After a week of drying it began to write on the SD card about 70% of the time.  This was at least an improvement but  still meant that I had a brand new camera that did not function properly and no way of replacing or repairing it until I returned home.  I was able to take non underwater photos of my trip but decided to save using it for underwater photography until the end of the trip when I'd be going to the best snorkeling site.I was able to use the camera underwater again by purchasing a plastic case for it while on the island which completely negates the reason to purchase this camera in the first place.  I could have simply bought a better point and shoot for the same amount of money and bought the casing.  The reason I did not due this is because most casing in my price point effect picture quality so I went with underwater camera that I thought would at least work for more than one day.Unfortunately I bought this at Target and the 30 day return policy has expired since I was in Saipan for nine weeks.  I am going to try and contact the company for a return or replacement (perhaps I just unlucky and bought a lemon) but I won't  be able to get back the missed opportunities that the failure of the underwater feature of this product created.My suggestion is to not purchase this camera for underwater photography, save your money and buy one with a better seal and locking mechanism.  The seal on this camera is flimsy at best and the lock isn't secure.

Reviews.Title: The Camera is not really shock proof, but works well underwater
Reviews.Author: Mme Thorel Michele
Reviews.Content: The camera is not that tough. My daughter dropped it on a wooden floor from 3 feet high and the camera stopped working. Quality of lens and zoom is not great. Needs improvement. The next versions may be better

Reviews.Title: Great camera!!!
Reviews.Author: B. Neiski
Reviews.Content: Bought this camera for a trip to Mexico and absolutely fell in love. Takes AMAZING underwater pictures. Got some pictures of sea turtles way underwater and the pictures are so clear and beautiful. The orange color is great because I can always find it really quickly in my bag among all the other black electronics.

Reviews.Title: Great rugged camera
Reviews.Author: S. Reese
Reviews.Content: Great all purpose camera. Beats the Go-Pro in my book.  Smaller, great resolution, small size, great battery life, and no extra case for waterproofing.

Reviews.Title: Good Underwater camera.
Reviews.Author: JakeKube
Reviews.Content: Good Underwater camera.  Out of water pictures are good not great.  I have a Canon SLR, so I might be biased.  This is a waterproof point at shoot that is easy to use underwater and takes pretty good pictures.Overall I've been happy with the camera as it suits my need for a camera to take snorkeling/kayaking/camping and not have to worry about getting it wet.  I know other people who have had a lot of durability issues with underwater cameras.  This one is easy to use and I haven't been worried about the seals or breaking it.

Reviews.Title: Not good for indoor shots, but produces AMAZING outdoor photos
Reviews.Author: K. Dieng "kdieng"
Reviews.Content: After researching a lot of under-water camera, I bought this one.  It takes GORGEOUS bright color photos.  However, I have noted that this is only for outside photos.  Indoor photos are very dark.  But we've taken it to the community pool a lot over 2 summers now.  Really gorgeous pool photos (professional quality).  Absolutely no problems with getting the camera wet.  Works like a charm, highly recommend.

Reviews.Title: OK, but not as good as the Sony TX20/30
Reviews.Author: RM
Reviews.Content: Not a bad camera for the price, but if you can afford to spend a little more I'd recommend the Sony TX20 or TX30. The waterproof feature of the Panasonic TS20 is nice, but it doesn't take that great of pictures overall. I only kept mine for a few months before moving on to a better waterproof camera.

Reviews.Title: Excellent camera!
Reviews.Author: P. Kelly "PK"
Reviews.Content: Excellent!  Excellent!  I bought this for my husband and he loves it.  The video feature is easy to use.  It takes very clear pictures.Highly recommend this little camera.

Reviews.Title: worth it. worked for me. best of luck for you...
Reviews.Author: CL Havas
Reviews.Content: picture quality is substandard compared to more current tech (iphone 4S, canon anything), but I've been lucky enough to have this little guy continue to work through 10+ snorkelling excursions, and get battered around in waves a few times too. It's probably luck of the draw, but this one worked for me and was a great deal for the ability to snap great pics under the sea!My pet theory is that camera manufacturers make up horror stories for the cheaper underwater cameras...but it might just be luck of the draw on your seals.

Reviews.Title: Great camera for the money
Reviews.Author: R. Bartell
Reviews.Content: Bit slow after each picture but takes good shots.  Panoramic is better than most, Had it two years almost and it is holding up great.  Battery life is long.

Reviews.Title: Great waterproof camera for vacations
Reviews.Author: Matthew M.
Reviews.Content: I bought this just a few days before my wife and I took a two week vacation in Hawaii. We discovered our previous (non-waterproof) digital camera, after many years of service, no longer turned on. Thankfully 2-day Prime shipping got this camera to us the day before we left!Overall we are very pleased with the usability of the camera and quality of the photos. I read that most people now tend to use the cameras on their smartphones, or own higher-end cameras such as DSLRs.  We enjoy bringing an easy to carry camera that we take with us to the beach and into the water...plus on future vacations. This camera was highly reviewed and I can see why.

Reviews.Title: Great underwater camera for the price
Reviews.Author: Alison Powell
Reviews.Content: I've had this camera for a couple years now and it's a great little underwater camera. This isn't a camera for professionals but it works really well for a point-and-shoot camera. This camera is also functional out of water and great for along a beach as long as you wipe away any sand to make sure it doesn't interfere with the waterproof seal around the battery and memory card.

Reviews.Title: Made it just past the warrantee
Reviews.Author: RUSE
Reviews.Content: This started out as a good camera for rough, wet, use. However, about two weeks out of warrantee, taking pictures of the grandkids in a splash park, it leaked and lost the display. Camera still works, just can't frame a shot or use the menu. Always made sure the door was properly latched, no dings or dents, don't know where it leaked.

Reviews.Title: Panasonic Lumix TS20.16 New user comments
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: It takes awhile to get used to its operation. Not always easy to see what you are getting a picture of when under water. And responds poorly to movement (picture turns out to be out of focus) underwater. Hopefully with more use I'll better understand what is doable and what is not. On the definite plus side it did not leak. It takes great out of water shots. Video mode is easy to use. Didn't like the fogging of the lenses a full night after using it under water. Defogging instructions do work, just takes awhile.

Reviews.Title: If you want to swim with your camera, this works.
Reviews.Author: Anthro Student
Reviews.Content: Takes pretty low quality pictures/video, I think you can take better pictures with your smart phone.However, if you are looking for a camera that takes pictures and video under water, this works.

Reviews.Title: Great while it lasted - about 1 day.
Reviews.Author: mikev
Reviews.Content: We bought this camera for a trip to St. John. It worked fine for the first part of the first day, then started to fog up, which lasted the rest of the day. The next day it seemed to have recovered (out of the water), but as soon as we started using it while snorkeling it fogged up again; then went into a loop where it was flashing something on the screen, then off, then on... Finally, it just stopped working altogether. We definitely did not open the camera while at the beach, and it never got wet inside. It was a very disappointing purchase and we won't consider another Panasonic "underwater" camera.

Reviews.Title: Leaks
Reviews.Author: Wayne De Loncker
Reviews.Content: First time in the water it leaked. Not bad for rain but when it is put under the water it leaks. Now it has stopped working, Lasted 7 months

Reviews.Title: So far so good
Reviews.Author: Keli Stambaugh
Reviews.Content: I am liking it so far, used it two times on vaca. Seems to take good pictures and no water problems.

Reviews.Title: Lumix hits the mark!
Reviews.Author: Sambed
Reviews.Content: Awesome features and i know if i get caught in a rainstorm it will not get ruined. As for underwater photography; I wouldnt use this. Get a GoPro or something more along those lines and you will be much happier.

Reviews.Title: Worked very well... Away from water!
Reviews.Author: Renato Seixas
Reviews.Content: The camera worked well while using it outside water. The third time I took pictures in the water, in less than 10 feet deep, it sopped working and never turned on again. Not surprising, after reading so many similar reviews. I sent the camera to the address that Panasonic gave in the Owne's manual but I'm still waiting for a reply. Very disappointing experience.

Reviews.Title: Shockproof
Reviews.Author: Mark
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera more for its shockproof capabilities than waterproof. I was always dropping cameras and the SD/battery door would break. I use it every day for work 40+ photos. Love the wide angle, I can get much more in the frame. Simple to use one-handed and fits nicely in my top pocket.Long battery life. Picture quality good (plenty good enough  for me)This was on offer, saving about $50.00. Price is reasonable even without discount. I would definitely buy again.

Reviews.Title: stopped working
Reviews.Author: steve
Reviews.Content: Have had this just over a year and it worked great, underwater, climbing, and it held its charge a long time.  Then, it just stopped and won't turn on.  No online support and repair costs more than a new one.  You'd think a waterproof, dustproof, shockproof camera would be tougher.

Reviews.Title: Deal of the day score
Reviews.Author: Matt
Reviews.Content: Bought this camera on a whim just to have a cheap multipurpose camera for vacations.  We normally use a professional canon SLR camera with a couple of different lenses.  With that said, yes we like good pictures. The camera came and felt nice with the aluminum style case. The battery and memory card is on the side behind a air tight and waterproof door.  You just have to remember to always use the lock button after sealing it.  We have had some close calls so its easy to forget.  The underwater option works great and don't mind our daughter using it to take fun pics at the pool and beach,  The pic quality is pretty good, but we found some tweaking was needed to get our desired results.  We bought the orange one because all other colors were sold out that day.  We are glad we did as we find it easy to find deep in a beach bag or at the bottom of a purse.  I think we paid around 100 bucks, and glad we ventured out of the canon world as we wouldn't hesitate to try a Panasonic product again.

Reviews.Title: Great camera for everyday use
Reviews.Author: Sonja Graves
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for a vacation in Hawaii.  I don't know much about photography so I don't want to spend too much money on a camera that is difficult to use.  I found this easy to use.  It takes really good pictures and the underwater feature has worked beautifully without any problems.  I used it underwater in Hawaii and at home in a swimming pool with great underwater pictures. It is so easy to use, my cousin who has a very impressive professional camera (that is not an underwater of course), loved using it for underwater shots.  The only problem I found was that the battery did not last even half a days use.  I did not know this or I would have tried to order a backup battery.  So half my time in Hawaii has no pictures from my camera.  I had to get copies of my cousins.

Reviews.Title: Works great
Reviews.Author: Karlylli web "Karlylli web"
Reviews.Content: I wanted to buy the Nikon cool pix but could not afforded so I wheat for this one I had it for about a year now and it has not let me down, I use it in or out of water and it takes good looking pictures for what you pay for they are not the best pictures out there but for what you pay for it is good and they are not bad either, the flash works good everything works good.

Reviews.Title: great camera for under water photos
Reviews.Author: jackie.513
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera to take with us for a trip to Hawaii knowing we will be snorkeling.Took some pictures of a sea turtle we saw while snorkeling, and they turned out great.

Reviews.Title: The camera was ok for a basic point and shoot, however...
Reviews.Author: Tomboii
Reviews.Content: I always used it with the manual's reccomendation yet one time I was on the beach and it leaked water inside permanently ruining it. At first I thought maybe I didn't shut the battery cover well and it was my fault but I realized that the part where it leaked water was on the opposite side of the battery cover and I did not even had it deep in the water and it just got wet momentarily. On top of that when I contacted Panasonic about this, since i got it with a 1 year warranty and it was only 8 months old, they just said that the camera was not under warranty when it was and referred me to local places where I could pay to get it checked. When I try to reply back their email it wouldn't let me since it was one of those no-reply automatic emails. So on top of having a product sold as waterproof when this is unreliable, they also have horrible customer service.Amazon assumed the warranty and refunded the camera price and asked me to return it so 1 star for this camera and 5 stars for Amazon's customer service.

Reviews.Title: Fogged up after one use
Reviews.Author: Deb W.
Reviews.Content: Got if for Christmas, but didn't use it until May on a trip to the Galapagos Islands.First time in, great. Second time, water must have gotten into the viewing screen, as it fogged up.The camera would take photos, but you couldn't see what you were taking. Not impressed at all.

Reviews.Title: panasonic lumix ts20 waterproof camera
Reviews.Author: Bill Mashek "rubicon adventures"
Reviews.Content: great water camera, I use it while suping or whitewater boating.  Pictures are not great.  also slow recovery between pictures.

Reviews.Title: Excellent, attractive camera.
Reviews.Author: jama555us
Reviews.Content: I was hesitant to buy this camera based on negative reviews. I decided to buy it anyway.I am glad that I bought it. Overall, it is a very user friendly, durable, and takes great pictures.I like the style of the camera. The fact that it is a solid metal camera, and it heavy and durable, makes me feel more comfortable to take it hiking.Pictures are very clear, and lag between pictures is minimal.It was very easy to transfer to pictures from camera to computer.One of the favorite features is the design and color.

Reviews.Title: Panasonic Lumix TS20 16.1 MP Waterproof Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: Jimmy Walker
Reviews.Content: I liked the Camera because it met my expections, exeeded some... I would recommend this camera to anyone...  Great Buy!

Reviews.Title: Not waterproof for long
Reviews.Author: James Rees
Reviews.Content: I had this camera 8 months and took it on two trips involving underwater photography, a total of maybe a dozen times in the water. I followed all the instructions. It leaked and stopped working on the first day of the second trip. As others have noted, the manufacturer won't do a thing for you if it leaks.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera, Poor "Security Strap"
Reviews.Author: Denise
Reviews.Content: First, I think the quality of pictures, ease of use, size of camera are top notch.  My problem was with the "security strap" - its really poor.  The first time I took the camera out in the water to use it and attached it to my wrist, the security strap broke off.  My suggestion is that if you plan to use the wrist strap at all, replace it before doing so.

Reviews.Title: GREAT CAMERA
Reviews.Author: Kayakeruth "Kayaker"
Reviews.Content: and GREAT pictures, underwater or not. The underwater capability makes this camera safe in circumstances that would ruin a regular camera, like rain, splashing, on  the beach, etc. Bought this one for my son, and now I want one!

Reviews.Title: Bad night shots
Reviews.Author: S. Baldi
Reviews.Content: Does not make good shots with low light, even with flash on. Under daylight, it makes excelent pictures and the waterproof is REALLY fun!

Reviews.Title: I got this cammera for Christmas!!!
Reviews.Author: Nancy Pena Garcia
Reviews.Content: The product is fantastic. Great pictures in and out of water. My family and partner were very impressive with this product. As Latina, we take a lot of pics. this product is just GOOD.Thanks,ONex

Reviews.Title: Great camera!
Reviews.Author: Stefanie slater
Reviews.Content: So far this camera is a great camera to use as a travel camera for both indoor and outdoor shots.

Reviews.Title: Not Waterproof - Stopped after using underwater 2 times
Reviews.Author: J.C.
Reviews.Content: I've only used this camera 2 times underwater, followed all the instructions and now it won't even turn on.  What a waste of money.  I was so excited about this camera too.  I did use in salt water, but rinsed afterwards and the compartments were shut.

Reviews.Title: Great pictures leaky case
Reviews.Author: mike
Reviews.Content: After dropping my cell phone in the river while fishing, I got a "waterproof" camera. As a travel camera it worked great. Excellent pictures. Worked great until I took it snorkling and it filled up with salt water. It is now completely broken. The waterproof seal is for non immersion type water best I can tell.

Reviews.Title: Awesome little camera
Reviews.Author: Lisa "Lisa"
Reviews.Content: // To view this video download Flash Player (version 9.0.115 or higher)'); } } catch(err) { fp_resizePlayerSpace('cv_mo2XR8W6CP6NVGU', 0, 0); } return false; } function _cv_mo2XR8W6CP6NVGUloadSwf(movieID, playerVersion) { var swfLocation = "http://g-ecx.images-amazon.com/images/G/01/am3/20120510035744301/AMPlayer._V148501545_.swf"; } } } Length:: 0:13 MinsI got this for a snorkeling excursion while on a cruise. It was great. I used it in the water and got excellent results. Being able to make movies and take pix underwater really made it fun and I have plenty of memories recorded. I rinsed and dried it up and used it for normal shooting the next day. I had no problems with it. It worked really well in all conditions and has different settings for different lighting situations. The camera is small and lightweight and easy to use. No complaints here. This is one video I took during the excursion, snorkeling in Cozumel.

Reviews.Title: great work camera
Reviews.Author: George Barry Adkins
Reviews.Content: i use this camera for work, im a crawlpace inspector, never know what enviroment i may tumble into. great pics, very durable.

Reviews.Title: Very solid product.
Reviews.Author: Sake "Sake Queeg"
Reviews.Content: Excellent!  Read all of the instructions and follow the instructions carefully to assure safe, warranty is preserved.The performance is excellent.

Reviews.Title: Worth the price
Reviews.Author: Last Trade
Reviews.Content: I got this camera to use on boat deliveries and for the beach. Pictures are very good and it being water resistant is a big plus. Down side it battery life, if you cannot recharge it daily you had better get additional batteries.

Reviews.Title: Works very well with good battery life.
Reviews.Author: M. Simmons
Reviews.Content: This camera is nicely packages for easy carry. The controls are simple and the performance is very good.I bought a spare 1100 ma Wasabi battery for it and found that it has come in very handy during a busy picture taking day. I definitely recommend at least one spare battery!

Reviews.Title: Love, love, love this camera
Reviews.Author: StressedMom
Reviews.Content: I absolutely love this camera. It has a much better battery life than my older digital camera and its waterproof!! We take cruises to the caribbean and can't wait to use it for underwater pictures. Its very easy to use and the pictures are excellent quality.

Reviews.Title: Headache
Reviews.Author: LizPL
Reviews.Content: Initially I loved the camera and was satisfied with it. I have had it for 8 months now, but have only used it for 3 trips. For the first two it worked perfectly. But on my last trip it suddenly went rogue and turns on but the top buttons are not working so I can't either take pictures or turn it off. Thankfully I bought insurance and I am sending it asap. It is not a reliable camera. I would consider other options.

Reviews.Title: Great pictures
Reviews.Author: Jason B "Indeed"
Reviews.Content: We've used it for typical stuff, underwater stuff in pool water, videos, and a bunch of other times and the pictures and movies are very high quality.  I can't say it's been very deep in water, but so far it's been a foot or 2 deep for pictures of the kids with no issues.

Reviews.Title: Mud runner's dream!
Reviews.Author: M.E.R. Matthews "ladybug11"
Reviews.Content: I have used this for a Muck Fest and a Tough Mudder, and I *LOVE* this camera.I wear gloves for obstacle courses, but this camera is still easy to handle with them on. The separate buttons for photos and video make it easy to take both, and I get WAY better pictures without having to wait a week for a handful of mostly awful professional photos. My whole TM team really appreciated being able to have action shots of themselves throughout the course, and the camera slipped right into the zipper pocket in my compression shorts between photo opportunities.This awesome camera has been through mud, water, sand, and ice baths taking video, and I have not been disappointed. The audio quality is great, too! I highly recommend it for mud runs.

Reviews.Title: great underwater camera
Reviews.Author: Christine
Reviews.Content: Bought because it can be used underwater, and it suits my purpose, snorkeling. Also takes nice photo's on land. Worked well on vacation, I would recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Get the Panasonic Lumix!
Reviews.Author: Capcyclone
Reviews.Content: For those looking for a good point & shoot digital camera - look no further!  This digital camera takes excellent pics (16.1MP) - and it is a fast operating camera.  It let's you take pics quickly!The case of the camera is also rather rugged - which is what attracted me to the camera.  I have not tested the waterproof capabilities of the camera, but I have no doubt about this - the battery compartment and memory card doors have nice, soft rubber protection to keep the water out.  The camera also features a "locking" switch to really close up the doors tightly.I'm very pleased with the decision to purchase this camera.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Philip Juhas "runner2002"
Reviews.Content: Excellent little camera. Works underwater, so far only in the pool, and takes very sharp pictures.  It's small enough to carry all the time.

Reviews.Title: Compact and perfect for teens
Reviews.Author: sue
Reviews.Content: My daughter used this when we went to Cancun and loved it!! underwater was so much fun for her to take pics..

Reviews.Title: I used it on our west carribean cruise and love it
Reviews.Author: helen
Reviews.Content: I used it on our west carribean cruise. took a lot of pictures while snorkling. The picture quality is nice. it's a nice camera

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: jay saulter
Reviews.Content: very happy, easy to use,small enough to easily carry in your pocket. takes great video and photos. i highly recommend

Reviews.Title: Truly waterproof, sometimes pictures are blurry
Reviews.Author: Courtney
Reviews.Content: I was impressed that the camera is waterproof as advertised. But for a camera that is supposed to take photos at 16.1 mp, the pictures can be really grainy and sometimes the pictures are blurry, even. It's hard to keep the lens from getting dirty also, which probably contributes to the smudgy looking photographs.

Reviews.Title: died 6 months into life!
Reviews.Author: MJ "coffee keeper"
Reviews.Content: I got this camera to document all work I do, and 6 months after purchased it stopped working the zoom failed and the whole camera doesn't work. very disappointed! I have 10 lumix cameras this one not so good.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Kari
Reviews.Content: Takes wonderful pictires, fast start-up. Easy to use.  And the price was great! Can't beat all the qualities for a waterproof camera. I still have not used it in the water yet!

Reviews.Title: Waterproof may be a stretch
Reviews.Author: madspaniard "Jared"
Reviews.Content: I did a significant amount of research for waterproof/tough cameras as I'm an avid outdoor adventurer.  My best friend recommended I check out this camera.  It had all the main features I was looking for and mainly the high quality 16 MP pictures.  I noticed mixed reviews, but after I compared the features and saw the price was very reasonable I decided to go for it.I have used the camera on a few trips outdoors and liked the picture quality.  The first time I had it out a friend was taking a picture of me and dropped the camera on a rock and into a mud puddle-that's one way to test it.  It seemed fine and had no issues.  I was a bit concerned about the waterproof feature after reading other reviews, but my friend with the same camera thoroughly used it underwater and assured me there were no problems.  So I took the camera with me on a cruise and used it for its intended purposes-I took it snorkeling.  Well, of course it leaked.  I  didn't notice until the evening when I took it out to take some shots and the screen looked funny, like there was too much light and the top of the screen was all bright.  The picture feature menu was all whited out and hard to see.  I opened up the battery door and sure enough the battery terminals were wet and there was some water inside.  Now before you say "oh this guy probably didn't use it right", let me assure you I followed the instructions to a tee.  I made sure the door was closed and locked, no debris in the seal, only had the camera submerged for less than probably 45 mins, and washed it thoroughly when done.  I never hit it on anything and was pretty careful with it.This was the first time I had used a camera like this and was a little skeptical in the first place.  Now the camera still worked and functioned good, it was just the screen that was messed up.  I continued to use it hoping the pics would turn out OK.  The next day the lens was fogged up and the screen was still too bright and looked like it had a fog layer as well.  This eventually cleared up and so did the brightness of the screen.  The pics turned out good except for a few when the lens was real foggy.  I was gonna send it in to Panasonic for warranty service, but it seems to be OK for now.  I'm just going to continue using it and see if there are any other issues seeing as I still have 7 months on the warranty.  I won't be taking it underwater again which isn't too big of a deal for me.Summary:Pro'sGood pic quality for a small handheld (16 MP)Great featuresDecent video (720P)Good soundVery compactVery reasonable priceFast turn on speedSeparate button for videoConsNot really waterproofNot HD1080 video (the one main feature I wish it had)Overall I would recommend at this point if you don't intend on getting it wet which I think some people may think that makes it kind of pointless to have a "waterproof" camera and not get it wet.I'll update the review if I have any more issues or end up needing to send it back.

Reviews.Title: A Real Disappointment
Reviews.Author: Joseph Kolupke
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for my wife's birthday in January.  She wasn't able to use it until March, when we went snorkeling in Mexico.  The camera took some very good pictures at first outing, then sprung a leak and shorted out.  Very disappointing.

Reviews.Title: Great pictures under and above water.
Reviews.Author: Jay
Reviews.Content: When i purchased this camera i was really impressed with the quality of pics. The recordings  in shallow water was also quite impressive. The camera reminds you to check, lock and ensure no particles are trapped between the door seal before taking it under the water. The camera was only used for snorkeling not diving. During my sixth snorkeling trip I checked the camera's door seal before entering the water, to my disappointment as i submerged I SAW BUBBLES COMING  THROUGH THE SHUTTER BUTTON. Of course the camera was completely ruined. Panasonic please investigate. This camera was only bought 18 months ago.

Reviews.Title: I can't believe it's broken!
Reviews.Author: Kellsye Paula Fabian
Reviews.Content: We bought this camera for our Puerto Rico trip last December. It worked fine, the underwater pictures weren't THAT great but they were good and I was happy with it. The battery died on the last leg of our island hopping tour and because I have another camera, I didn't bother charging this one. I rinsed and dried the camera as instructed and put it away. All along I thought I was in good condition until now that I am preparing for another trip. I was so shocked to discover that it's broken! There are sediments inside the glass of the screen and whenever I turn it on, the screen would just light up yellow. It's so frustrating that I was only able to use it underwater once and that I thought it was fine only to discover that it was actually broken 3 months after the return window has expired (although I doubt that amazon will take it back since they can rule it out as "water damage"). This camera is a waste of money!!!

Reviews.Title: Worked Beautifully
Reviews.Author: David G Ensign
Reviews.Content: Bought it to use at a water park, and it worked flawlessly in both photos and video.  It did exactly what I wanted it to do.

Reviews.Title: Rough housed and under water - Great pix & still kicking
Reviews.Author: Jeffery Hall
Reviews.Content: This camera takes excellent pictures. Has every scene mode under the sun along with panoramic. Pictures and video under water are spectacular. It has been to Aruba twice and Bahamas so it has seen its share of sand and mostly under water snorkeling still no issues. And best compliment we can give is that it was so good we bought a second one so we don't have to share.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic
Reviews.Author: B. W.
Reviews.Content: I took my wife to the Dominican and we planned to go snorkeling so I did some research on wht camera took good underwater pictures. After reading multiple reviews I choose this camera and was super pleased with the results!! Not only is it small and easy to hold, but it took phenomenal pictures! We got remarkable pictures of sharks even up to 15 feet away!

Reviews.Title: IT got wet
Reviews.Author: KNo
Reviews.Content: Bought this to go on vacation. Took great pictures until it got wet! Though it was waterproof. We never went more than 2ft deep in water and water still got in camera and it no longer works. Great camera just don't get it wet!

Reviews.Title: AWESOME!
Reviews.Author: Sherri Norcal
Reviews.Content: GREAT for underwater photography.  Used it in the ocean at Cabo San Lucas and in the salt water pools.  Great pictures of fish and my fish (kids)  great quality of photos too.  Love the panorama shots of Cabo I was able to get.  Get deal!  Just follow the directions for drying and cleaning and all will go well.  Love it.

Reviews.Title: This camera broke the 1st time in the water
Reviews.Author: Emkitten
Reviews.Content: This camera broke the first time I used it in the water. I followed all directions and it was only 2 feet deep in the water. I don't recommend this if you are going to actually submerge it in water.

Reviews.Title: Leaks, camera died in the Galapagos
Reviews.Author: B. Karnofsky
Reviews.Content: Purchased this for a trip to the Galapagos.  Followed all of the instructions, but unfortunately water leaked into the camera.  I got a total of 5 shots before the camera leaked and stopped working.  The memory card survived, but the camera's electronics were fried. The shots that I did get looked similar to those that you'd get with a $10 disposable waterproof camera.  Its crazy that this model is called "tough" and "waterproof."  Worse yet, I don't have pictures of the iguanas (they swim in the Galapagos), turtles, seals, fish, etc.  I'm still looking for a durable, reasonably priced camera that takes good underwater shots.  Any suggestions?

Reviews.Title: Worked Great! But for only 3 times...
Reviews.Author: Aija
Reviews.Content: Bought this camera because I was moving to Hawaii and figured I'd see lots of sea critters that I'd want to take pictures of. First time I used it was just to dip it into the water (about 2-3 inches under the surface) to take pictures of some sea turtles that were insanely close by, and WOW! The pictures turned out AWESOME! I was super stoked that I bought this camera.Then I used it again, had it a little deeper in the water this time (about four feet below the surface). I used it in the water for about a half hour, pictures turned out okay, but the water had a bit of current to it so it wasn't as clear as the last place I was at. Btw, this camera is not great at "above water" pictures. They always turned out really washed out and cruddy, but I was always excited about the underwater quality (cameras can not be blamed for currents stirring up sand and muck in the water). Then again, I'm no expert on cameras, but I couldn't seem to figure out how to get the non-water pictures to turn out good.ANYWAY! Then my third time using the camera I was again, in the water, camera was, at most, 4ft down in the water, used it for about 15 minutes, even got some video this time which was super awesome and exciting and then suddenly, out of nowhere, all the buttons stopped working. Not a single button other than, oddly enough, the power button, worked. Just out of the blue, they all stopped, and haven't gotten them to work since. I've soaked the camera in fresh water, cleaned it out, dried it out for weeks, nothing. It turns on and off, but can't do anything other than that. So I went back, read the one-star reviews and it seems like most people had the same problem with the buttons stopping working after 2-3 underwater uses. So, I guess that's that. $120 gives you about 2-3 underwater photo shoot fun times, and that's it. It's a real bummer too because I really loved this camera before it stopped working. ALTHOUGH, I did notice that each of those times I used it under water, no matter how clean the rubber was, or how tightly the latch was closed, there'd always be a tiny bit of water all over the inside of the door that goes to the battery and memory card. That always made me nervous.Very disappointed. I really did love this camera. It just didn't last nearly as long as I'd hoped (obviously. Who'd fork out $120 for a camera that's only going to work three times?!). Back to using disposable underwater cameras!

Reviews.Title: excellent
Reviews.Author: Nazareth Hernandez
Reviews.Content: very good product, and the estimated transfer passed off without inconvenience. fully recommend buying through this company, very responsible ..

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: rcruz
Reviews.Content: The main reason I bought this camera was to stop being worried about the water, spe ially around kids. Takes good pictures. A real good toy

Reviews.Title: Problem with Water
Reviews.Author: payment
Reviews.Content: Dears,I received the camera ok. I use twice and entered water on the screen.I would like to know what I need to do.Can I return the camera and you send me a new back?Please tell me.Tks Ana Carolina

Reviews.Title: Great investment
Reviews.Author: Jrod
Reviews.Content: Very nice camara, nice features I recently went on a cruise and tested under water videos and pics were awesome...

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Tirso Gonzalez "Studio Several"
Reviews.Content: Excellent camera. Great price! strong body, very nice picture quality. My child love it.I would buy it again if I need it.

Reviews.Title: Shockproof? no. Then not waterproof.
