Reviews.Author: Christina Wodtke "~christina~"
Reviews.Content: I adored this camera's previous model. and I adored this during a visit to mexico. And then, in Belize while snorkeling, it suddenly had a crack in the screen (without me dropping it or anything violent occuring)And the crack was followed my moisture and fogging. And then, camera death.If they didn't say it was shockproof, I wouldn't be mad. But, consider yourself warned.It does take great photos, underwater and above. Just handle with care. A crack can be the beginning of the end.

Reviews.Title: do not buy this camera
Reviews.Author: janel
Reviews.Content: Bought this camera for Christmas specifically for vacation to punts cana on Feb 24th so never used until vacation! This camera lasted one day did everything by the book made sure nothing was blocking the seal so the second day took couple pics in the ocean went back to relax soaked it in fresh water for the 10 mins and little while later turned it on and LCD screen was all lines opened battery compartment and sure enough it was wet! This camera was never more than 2 to 3 feet below the surface cause I didn't even get a chance to snorkel with it so I got 17 pics from my 8 day vacation used the camera twice! So I get back call Panasonic tell them everything and request full refund guy basically laughs ate and says we rarely give refunds so I had to send camera to them and give written requests of what I wanted first refund 2 nd a brand new camera of a different model no returns and an upgrade. Just got call from Panasonic no refund and they will give me a different model and its refurbished not new am so dissapointed I will never purchase anything made by this company again. So if you buy something from amazon for vacation make sure it will be within the 30 day return window I've learned my lesson!! Update received replacement camera and its the wrong camera will never buy another Panasonic product again customer service is garbage just like the product!

Reviews.Title: Did exactly what it said it would!
Reviews.Author: Ambar
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my husband as a surprise for our Hawaii trip, so he can take pictures while we snorkeled.  He not only liked it, but LOVED it.. My husband always lets me take the pictures on our trips, but this time he was the photographer!  Took wonderful underwater shots, as well as regular day/night time shots.  No water or sand ever got inside the camera.. He was able to swim down about 10-15 Meters and it didn't effect the camera one bit! The zoom works well under water as well.  Cleaned up nicely too, not to much maintenance after you use it, Just soak it in clean water for a half an hour, wash it off and your good to go on your next trip!  Only thing, PLEASE BE CAREFUL OF THE VIEW SCREEN, it scratches easily.  First time using it, getting into the water a rock scratched it and it's going to be there forever! We see it as a memory of where it happened, others might get upset and feel its the quality of the plastic covering the view screen.

Reviews.Title: Great for a vacation trip
Reviews.Author: Melissa Griffin
Reviews.Content: bought this to go on a cruise and it delivers good pictures.  Used it while snorkling and got average results.  Not to be used for high quality pictures such as in weddings or special lifetime moments.  Seems to be durable, but i haven't tossed it around a lot either

Reviews.Title: My daughter has become a shutterbug
Reviews.Author: Aiken & Hightower
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for my daughter for Chrismas. She carries it with her everywhere and has taken thousands of great pictures.

Reviews.Title: It died after second day!
Reviews.Author: Alexander Bullio Guillen
Reviews.Content: Even when I checked all the intructions before using it, the water got into my camera the second day I used it. Just before it stoped working I was able to see some bubbles comming out from that orifice it has next to the ON/OFF button, so, I can tell the battery door had nothing to do. Great camera but not to use into the water... dont lose your money like I did.

Reviews.Title: Love it!!!
Reviews.Author: emily hua
Reviews.Content: Got it in the mail.  The box wasn't the best shape, but the camera was perfect!  I took it up with me to the snow.  So far so good, it handled freezing temperatures and thick snow fall.  The panaramic feature wasn't great, but it still worked half the time.  Hopefully I can update this review with more info as I use it more!

Reviews.Title: Don't waste your money.
Reviews.Author: coastalman
Reviews.Content: Our camera shared the fate of many others. After two snorkel trips of less than an hour, the camera quit working. We were careful to follow the instructions about rinsing after use and draining properly and letting it dry. At first the lense fogged up from the inside and took poor pictures, but eventually it would not turn on at all. We ended up renting an underwater camera for the rest of our trip.  Waterproof!! What a joke! I would give it no stars if I could.

Reviews.Title: Decent pix; love the usability
Reviews.Author: Carolyn Fonkert
Reviews.Content: Got this for our honeymoon since I knew we would be in a wet environment and I didn't want to worry about our camera getting slightly damp.  Found this camera to be very easy to use.  The pictures weren't the best ever, but they were pretty good.  I would say on par with most basic cameras in this price range.  We took it on the beach, to the pool, through rain forests & downpours: it was really nice not having to worry about keeping it "safe."  I could just take pictures regardless the weather.  Very pleased with the pix when I got home & uploaded them.

Reviews.Title: NICE CAMERA
Reviews.Author: Lorraine Crespin
Reviews.Content: THIS IS A MUST HAVE CAMERA FOR FILED USE IN MY JOB AS A PLANNER FOR THE NF, NICE AND COMPACKED

Reviews.Title: Flash stopped working
Reviews.Author: Jessica Robinson
Reviews.Content: Took the camera on a three month vacation and the flash stopped working less than one month into my trip. Now the camera has a hard time focusing too. So no flash and without flash, no focus. The camera has a warranty but it doesn't do me much good if I'm traveling in foreign countries. Would not recommend buying this camera as it has caused more problems than capturing important moments and I will now be without a properly working camera for the rest of my trip.

Reviews.Title: Waterproof but picture quality is meh
Reviews.Author: C. Lee
Reviews.Content: So this survived Hawaii in both fresh and saltwater. The picture quality is what you would expect from such a small lens/sensor but for the price, this is a great waterproof camera.

Reviews.Title: EXELENTE
Reviews.Author: javier tejidor
Reviews.Content: BUEN ARTICULO LO DISFRUTE AL MAXIMO EN LAS PISCINAS Y EN LOS PARQUES ACUATICOS LO RECOMIENDO 100 PORCIENTO FACIL DE MANIPULAR

Reviews.Title: No waterproof!!!
Reviews.Author: Karen
Reviews.Content: I bought camera to take on island vacation, on in a life time. Took it in Caribbean snorkeling got some great pictures but when we got out of water I turned the camera on to view pictures only to find out camera did not turn on. When I took battery out of camera there was no water inside so I don't know why it shorted out but it's an expensive camera for one use only

Reviews.Title: Sea water
Reviews.Author: Jaq
Reviews.Content: This works very well underwater and works great in salt water!. I bought this for my vacation and it worked wonderfully! I had no worries that is was going to leak which is a good thing because I had bought an underwater case for my iphone and got scared after testing it. After using this camera in sea water you need to soak it in clean unsalted water for at least an hour before opening it. The only reason why I gave it 4 stars and not 5 is because the quality for the underwater could be a little better, other then that a great camera above and below water :)

Reviews.Title: Great for play around the water
Reviews.Author: lwhewett
Reviews.Content: I purchased this little camera recently when my family scheduled a weekend at an indoor water park.  I wanted to be able to take pictures and video without worrying about damaging my camera due to water and perhaps having it slip out of the hands while in use.  This little jewel fit the bill. OK - you have to realize that it isn't your top of the line camera so if you expect to get perfect shots every time you'll be disappointed!  But if you want to have fun in and under the water it is very nice.  It also makes nice pictures in optimal situations.  I read a review that said the battery life was short but mine worked well for me and I can probably purchase a spare for not a great outlay.  For just having a good time around the water I love it!

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: cab1309
Reviews.Content: Bought this camera to take on Cruise. Used it while snorkeling, works great under water and takes really good pictures. Easy to use, and reasonably priced. Would definitely recommend it.

Reviews.Title: No waterproof at all
Reviews.Author: Jacques
Reviews.Content: Nice photos and videos but first time in the pool and water was inside. A very bad product. I will never buy Panasonic again.

Reviews.Title: It's okay
Reviews.Author: Himanshu Dani
Reviews.Content: The reason for this comment is because we ordered one We used it in the ocean, it took excellent photographs, but for some reason the screen started behaving erratically. Hence we had to order a replacement, which was promptly given to us by Amazon (good service there) and since we have gotten the replacement, we have not used it...Out first experience was obviously not great but I am hoping that the new repalced camera willnot give a problem.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful outdoor camera!
Reviews.Author: Judy Eskridge
Reviews.Content: Took this camera, along with four teenage grandkids, on a recent cruise.  It takes great underwater pictures and we ultimately used it for ALL outdoor pictures.

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: Jerry p
Reviews.Content: Everything went well it even shipped a couple of days earliervery pleased with everything. Thats all I want to sayJP

Reviews.Title: Best Family Camera!
Reviews.Author: tdk
Reviews.Content: We actually have two of these now - and we use them all the time.  They are user-friendly, super durable, well-priced, and versatile.  We returned a Fuji XP (the comparable all-weather version) because the quality and features did not compare to the Lumix.  We have taken them snorkeling, kayaking, camping, and to various amusement parks with no problems at all.  Highly recommend this camera to get the job done!

Reviews.Title: Poor, Poor Product
Reviews.Author: Timothy R Trowell
Reviews.Content: I chose this camera because it claimed to be "waterproof"........It's anything but that !!!!!!  I just returned from a cruise that took me to Grand Cayman and Cozumel. My only reason for this camera was to take it and capture some picture's underwater in the gorgeous waters of these two places....  I followed the steps without flaw and still water seeped in somehow and ruined all of my picture's I had taken. So, to say I'm disappointed, upset and mad are an understatement.......  I highly recommend that "YOU DO NOT PURCHASE" this if you have any intention's of taking picture's underwater.......

Reviews.Title: Buen Precio >>  Excelente calidad
Reviews.Author: Douglas MN
Reviews.Content: esta cámara es excelente no tengo quejas de ella y mucho menos por el precio.  la recomiendo 100% . ;)

Reviews.Title: Nice camera
Reviews.Author: Greg Rafaelian
Reviews.Content: I have reada few other reviews that were not very good but I have no problems with mine. I think it is a good camera and do not know what others are talking about. The camera does what it is supposed to do. Just follow the instructions and keep it clean and it will last a long time. I went on vacation and took a lot of pics without having to charge the battery. I did not use the video part of the camera but the battery charge lasted me a long time.

Reviews.Title: satisfiesd
Reviews.Author: amanda
Reviews.Content: excellent porducto what I expected, talking about their characters, to use the battery is discharged below the water very fast and the images are not very nice. is a recognized brand but I think with time q This version will be better ... must follow the directions exactlyI am satisfied

Reviews.Title: Warning - Advanced Owners Manual ONLY on CD
Reviews.Author: Mmmmm "mraiffa"
Reviews.Content: I bought my TS-20 last June and have been using it in and out of the water since.  The pictures are pretty good, not spectacular but good enough for casual purposes.I'm giving the camera 1 star because of a support issue.  The real owners manual is ONLY on the CD (.pdf form) that comes with the camera. There is a 31 page "basic" manual, but that doesn't tell you ANYTHING about the menus/settings/etc - it just says go to the CD that came with the camera and �open the "Owner�'s Manual for advanced features (PDF format)�" .So, of course after 9 months we moved and I lost the CD.  Normally this wouldn't be a problem because everybody posts their user/owners manuals on line these days - right?  Well, apparently not Panasonic!  After an hour Googling and only finding countless copies of the same "basic" manual I called Panasonic support.  They couldn't find it on line either - although they did find one dead link!  Their only recommendation was to contact the Parts dept and order a new CD.So, I'm giving the camera 1 star for Panasonic NOT posting the real owners manual on-line anywhere!  If you buy it be sure to copy the manual from the CD and save it along with back ups - otherwise you may be writing your own 1 star review in a few months!p.s. if anybody has a copy of the real manual from the CD, I would love a copy at markts20-help@yahoo.com

Reviews.Title: waterproof
Reviews.Author: Heath
Reviews.Content: this product started out well, then at some point it got water into the lens, camera still operates but if its been in water the picture is garbage because water on lens

Reviews.Title: Wonderful Camera and video
Reviews.Author: gary
Reviews.Content: Takes great photos and also good videos, but the pickup is really fine so you do get a lot of rustling sound on your videos.  Great piece of gear for the price.

Reviews.Title: Amazing!
Reviews.Author: Jill A. Cullen "wilsons mom"
Reviews.Content: Well, this camera didn't totally win me over at first. The battery door seemed too easy to open to me.  It kept accidentally opening.  I gave the camera to my husband and bought something else for myself.Well, this weekend, he had it on Lake George ice fishing in 32 feet of water.  The camera got dropped down a hole, seemingly lost forever.  About 4 hours later another person in his group reeled it in.  Four hours in 32 feet of cold water!  He immediately took the battery out of it.  Just in case, we put it in a bag of rice for a few days.  Today, we replaced the battery and it works like a charm and all pictures are still in tact.  Unbelievable especially since the camera is rated for 16 feet.

Reviews.Title: If you got the $$ go for the deeper model
Reviews.Author: JRV
Reviews.Content: Had to return the first one because the screen went funky after first dive of ten feet or so. Have not had the second one in water yet but will be keeping to the six foot or less water depths.Beyond the screen issue, the pictures were great and the camera was easy to use. I think it would be a great camera for folks that do most of their adventures above water but still get wet on occasion.

Reviews.Title: Great little camera
Reviews.Author: kychle
Reviews.Content: So far so good. Have only used it for regular picture taking. Haven't tried under water yet. Bought for my daughter who has dropped it a few times so I guess the shockproof works! Great price!

Reviews.Title: Better than expected
Reviews.Author: Holly "FILMCHICK"
Reviews.Content: My grandson who is 2 smashed my 6 year old granddaughter's old camera on the floor and broke it, along with her heart. So I researched "real" cameras that were more sturdy and decided on this one.  She loves it and takes photos all the time. So far, it's still in good working order and takes really nice pictures.After 8 months:  This is a terrific point and shoot camera. My granddaughter loves it; when she can get my daughter-in-law to let go of it.  My daughter-in-law uses it more than her own camera, citing what great photos it takes.  After a recent vacation, my daughter-in-law also commented on what great underwater photos it took. The underwater photos were some of the best I've seen with a point and click camera. .

Reviews.Title: Happy of buying it.
Reviews.Author: Sergio Barrachina Blasco
Reviews.Content: I was searching similar cameras but finally I bought this one. I haven't regret any single day since I have it. The quality of the pictures is very nice, totally waterproof and quite light.It has all I expected from it in a very high quality way, including the video recording.If you're looking for a camera for you adventures in rivers and beaches, this is your camera.

Reviews.Title: Warning: DO NOT BUY!!!
Reviews.Author: jon
Reviews.Content: We thought this would be a great camera for our winter vacation, since we would be on the water.  The camera took okay pictures until the first time we used it in the water.  The screen on the back of the camera was all fogged up and tons of little water droplets.  We had to use the camera without being able to see what we were taking a picture of.  We also bought a disposable digital camera in case the expensive camera's pictures did not come out good.  Well, I just returned from vacation, and all of the photos look like they were taken under heavy fog conditions.  Totally garbage.  Save yourself some money and just use a disposable camera, it will work much better than this piece of garbage.  Just bought an expensive paper weight.

Reviews.Title: Great for the price
Reviews.Author: Nick Burns
Reviews.Content: Don't thing you'll capture any masterpieces with this, it survived three days in the South China sea, moist environment, in and out of the water, hot and cool, dives down to about 15'. A few drops of leakage, but they stayed in the gasket, and never a problem. It's easy to use, the menus are simple, ample buttons and sizes. The only downside is the volume of the autofocus when using the video; it's constantly going and is loud enough to be heard, at least in the background, in spite of all other audio. Underwater, rather than hearing silence, small clicks, etc, you'll hear that focus grinding away...

Reviews.Title: Surprisingly Good Pictures!
Reviews.Author: Kathy D. Vandeventer "kdvande"
Reviews.Content: This camera does not have a zoom on the lens but it takes great landscape and underwater pictures! It cannot be beat for the price and it's durability.

Reviews.Title: Dead in the Water
Reviews.Author: Mae "mes2000"
Reviews.Content: My brand-new Lumix took 200 photos in an hour of snorkeling in the ocean, and then it died permanently like quite a few of the other reviewers' Lumixes. I figure that's a little less than $1 a photo, which would have been a normal price in the old film-camera days (it also cost around $3 for Costco's service to rescue the photos from the card).  Is it under warantee? Other reviewers don't hold out much hope -- anyway it will be too late for this trip.So if you are planning a snorkeling vacation with several times in the water, I suggest you buy three or four of these cameras so you'll have a new one ready for each dive.

Reviews.Title: Very good camera! Until it stopped working..
Reviews.Author: Ricardo
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera and used it for around 3 months and it was very exciting. It took great pictures and videos, battery lasted a long time and the price was a great deal. We had a great relationship and I feel confident to say that we loved each other. I used it in swimming pools and in the ocean, at shallow depths.Then last weekend I went snorkeling. After I was done, I got to the shore and I wanted to see the awesome pictures and videos but the screen wasn't working!! I tried again at home but no luck, and it seems water good into the screen (I can see condensation). The camera turns on/off and apparently it takes pictures, but I can't see them or any other on-screen options. I always was very careful taking care of the camera, and still somehow water got in the screen. You actually only have control on the lid that encloses the battery and the memory card, and water has never gotten into that lid. So definitely the camera had a defect. I haven't contact Panasonic yet, but I feel very discouraged to do so after reading so many negative feedback about similar cases. I bought the camera in the US but I live in Costa Rica, so it is going to be expensive to me to send the camera back and forth for repair services. I'm starting to think that it doesn't even make sense to do that.This is VERY disappointing. I loved this camera. And she loved me. Or I thought so :(

Reviews.Title: Great little camera
Reviews.Author: Larry
Reviews.Content: This is a great underwater camera that we use out of the water as well. It takes very good photos and is durable. We bought it for vacation and got some excellent shots of sea turtles and fish, and just some photos of us goofing off.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera! Great Price!
Reviews.Author: Fernandez Rivera Oscar Rolando "orfer"
Reviews.Content: I really liked this camera! I got it in an offer for less than a hundred dollars and it was worth it! It really takes great pictures underwater!

Reviews.Title: Not that tough
Reviews.Author: Deborah A. Brown "Need-to-exercise girl"
Reviews.Content: Well, don't know what I did this time, but its trip into the ocean took it down. I have to say, its pictures are pretty good. I LOVE the panoramic feature of this camera. It makes the BEST panos. So easy, no putting together images. Seamless. I DO love that about this camera.  But maybe it was one tiny dust piece that made it water trip lethal to its existence.  It worked great in the water. Dried it off and then in the half hour when I went to take it picture, it would not work. She is in the shop now and I hope she can be fixed. I did purchase the extended warranty.  The price was very good though.

Reviews.Title: good pictures
Reviews.Author: Stephen Wells "Steve"
Reviews.Content: i like the camera it takes good pictures but my son bought the nikon for a few dollars more and the nikon  reall worth the extra dollars

Reviews.Title: Good Buy
Reviews.Author: john gendron
Reviews.Content: Did my research and decided on the Lumix.  Bought it for the rugged qualities.  Have already dropped it once from four feet and no damage.  Very good picture quality.  Nice features.

Reviews.Title: Great little camera for travel and water play
Reviews.Author: Joel D
Reviews.Content: This camera was just what I wanted for vacation pix. The Amazon price was great. It is safe around the pool and ocean and takes better than average pix almost anywhere. I have it around my wrist whenever I snorkel and love capturing those special underwater discoveries. I have had no problems with it at all.

Reviews.Title: LUMIX TS20
Reviews.Author: Maria Rondon
Reviews.Content: La he usado en playa y piscina y las fotos son increíbles también en ambientes normales y las fotos tienen alta resolución.. la recomiento 100%

Reviews.Title: Rent instead or buy something better.
Reviews.Author: Alla Sobel
Reviews.Content: 2 days snorkeling on the great barrier reef, it fogged up inside and ultimately would not turn on until well-dried. The manufacturer also doesn't exactly advertise that it has a recommended time limit of an hour underwater.When it worked, it was OK. It could use a better sensor with fewer megapixels. But, who cares? It is just not waterproof. What's the point?If you can rent an underwater camera, do so. If you need one often enough, this is not it. Buy something better.Support was terrible too. I sent it back. They told me they could send me a new one in red. I preferred blue to avoid the possibility of scaring fish with a bright red camera and told them I could wait for a blue one. Instead, they repaired the camera we sent in despite my assertion that I would never trust this camera again.Whatever. Now I have it back. If I do decide to try it again, I'll make sure not to have a particularly expensive flash card and not to be too upset when (I mean if) it dies again. If it's important and I will be upset, I'll do something else. This camera is garbage. In my opinion it is flawed in its design. If they can't guarantee it in the water for more than an hour, it probably can't be guaranteed for an hour either.

Reviews.Title: Sweet camera
Reviews.Author: Lorraine
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my 10yo daughter for Christmas. She wanted one to take pix underwater in the summer. We haven't tried that yet since it's still winter but it does take nice clear pix. We're very impressed!

Reviews.Title: Small, easy to use, great images…makes me nervous
Reviews.Author: Timothy Savage
Reviews.Content: I purchased the Lumix after reading over 50 reviews on various sites. The commun theme seems to be a failure in the water seals during early usage. based on my long relationship with Amazon, I purchased this camera for our annual family trip to warmer climates. I was amazed at the small size, intuitive nature of the controls and quality of the pictures right from the get go. Because of the reviews, I took the warnings about reading all instructions and followed them to the letter from the moment I took the camera out of the packaging. Our first foray foray into the water (pool) went off without a hitch. Great images, easy to use event the zoom was easy underwater. I took movies and about 50 pictures and saw nothing to concern me.On day two, I noted moisture in the view finder. I ignored it per the instructions and the moisture faded away after the morning. After letting the camera dry out on a towel for several hours, I wiped it down again and then brushed around the opening to confirm no particles. When I opened the battery door, I noted two rivulets of water in the seal track. This would appear to be water that was still pulled in when the door was open. The rivulets were tiny, but still of concern.I love the camera and have not had any issues, but I will be testing it further over the next week. If there are any issues, I will revise my comments and be sending this back to Amazon.

Reviews.Title: It's a good water proof camera
Reviews.Author: Steve
Reviews.Content: I used the camera at Disney World.  One hotel has speakers under water in their pool.  I used the video option, you can clearly hear music underwater.  I used the camera under watetr in daylight, pictures come out great.  I have been a little disappointed with the camera's pictures in lower light settings--often they don't come out well compared to other cameras I have used.

Reviews.Title: AMAZING!!
Reviews.Author: Steven S. Abadi
Reviews.Content: what can i say more about this, i took this camera to my honey moon in Bora Bora and it was AMAZING. to get all the pictures i did, i needed an underwater camera and this was the perfect one. it was price point, it was small, and took great pictures and videos to show the family and friends. its a great buy for me and i highly reccomend it! enjoy!!

Reviews.Title: Good waterproof camera for a Kid
Reviews.Author: Niwi
Reviews.Content: My son wanted his own camera and we looked for something that he can drop and even dump into the water. This camera is sturdy and simple to use so it does the job

Reviews.Title: works good so far, kid loves it
Reviews.Author: Marjorie W. Dunaway "MarjD"
Reviews.Content: I read, read, re-read many many reviews about several cameras in the class. Settled on this one as it seemed to get improved ratings recently - from pretty good to quite good. My son loves it and its working well.  He likes the slim profile and expected durability.  Haven't challenged its water proof features.  But we wanted it for weather resistance and don't plan on going deep w it.  But if we drop it in a bog or snow, get rained on we expect it to work. Compact and shipping was FAST. Edit 4-2-13: Camera holding up well, son still loves it.  We head out on a 3 wk vacation soon; that may be a good trial for it.

Reviews.Title: Good Point and Shoot
Reviews.Author: Brittany Wray
Reviews.Content: This little camera does exactly what I expected it to do. It takes decent shots quickly and the camera has been indestructible thus far. It has been dropped and taken into the water several times. With that being said, you get what you pay for in terms of picture quality. I am used to a D-SLR Canon so obviously this doesn't compare, but the pictures aren't bad compared to other other point and shoots I've had. Overall I'd recommend!

Reviews.Title: water proof
Reviews.Author: JINGLAN WEI
Reviews.Content: i bought it since the water proof function. it was good and easy, also the quality of the pic is also good as other digital cameras.

Reviews.Title: Sometimes leaves color casts over pics
Reviews.Author: Amy Lillevold
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for my 15 year old son for our trip to Mexico. It was great for snorkeling! In underwater mode it would take pictures in such rapid succession you could make a movie! Of course the camera takes video under water as well. It has a great zoom lens and takes very clear photos. The only issue was that sometimes consecutive pics would have a blue color cast to them. I am not sure if it was because my son left it in underwater mode or what. I ended up having to remove some color casts online using Picasa. My husband and I are considering purchasing this camera for ourselves, as well, since it is so affordable.

Reviews.Title: Does more than expected
Reviews.Author: rgd
Reviews.Content: My wife bought me this for use snorkeling--but it does so much more!  It is truly a full-featured, yet very compact, camera with many extras (including video and panoramic capabilities).  The only negative is that it is only good down to 16 feet--fine for snorkeling, but not for scuba diving.  Great to take to the beach!  It does not come with a memory card, which must be purchased seperately, but it uses the widely available SD type of card

Reviews.Title: Lumix TS20 waterproof camera
Reviews.Author: Nicole
Reviews.Content: The camera was a great buy for me. The pictures come out clear underwater and above water. Its easy to use and the bright color makes it hard to lose.

Reviews.Title: Broke 2 days after delivery
Reviews.Author: NKingsbury "-College-"
Reviews.Content: I got this camera for work (Archaeology can be wet and dirty). I never got a chance to use it for work before it quit working. The buttons started to change functions i.e. the button to take pictures would turn the camera off and the power button actually didn't do anything (I had to take the battery out to turn the camera off). Finally, the camera would turn itself off and on as if it went into standby and woke itself up. I ended up buying a FujiFilm XP camera and have had no issues with it yet. As for the Lumix I am sending it in for repairs now (suppose to be free replacement as it is still under warranty...we'll see about that).  I do want to stress that I never got this camera wet, never dropped it, nor did I even get the chance to get it dirty. I don't think my experience is standard for this product and no product can be perfect everytime and therefore I will update this review after my experience sending away the product for repair or replacement. I just want people to know what can happen when they get the Panasonic product that managed to sneak past the Q.C. department. Fingers crossed all goes well and I can continue to do business with Panasonic in the future.UPDATE*** 02/04/2012 received an exchange today from Panasonic customer support. Not only was the process straight forward and easy. They sent me the updated model TS4 with GPS etc as a replacement. I am very satisfied with the way that Panasonic handled my issue and went above and beyond to insure my satisfaction. I will be a repeat customer based on this encounter. I tried out the replacement camera and really do love the product.

Reviews.Title: Consistently beautiful pictures
Reviews.Author: MV
Reviews.Content: Great picture quality, easy interface with PC - I haven't tried to upload to my Mac yet.  The buttons are not user friendly to review photos etc, but I have used Panasonic in past so this was not an issue this time.

Reviews.Title: Great out-door camera
Reviews.Author: Michael S.
Reviews.Content: We ordered this right before our honeymoon; we took it snorkeling, kayaking, ATV-ing, and to the beach.  Some of our favorite photos from the trip came from this camera, not our DSLR.  Outdoor pics are clear, with crisp colors.  Indoors it's not quite as useful; lots of noise, slow focusing.  Can't do everything well, but it does quite a few things great.

Reviews.Title: REVIEW OF THE PANA TS20 16.1MP WATERPROOF CAMERA
Reviews.Author: Fish411
Reviews.Content: Great camera for the price.  Physically small & lightweight to carry in any pocket, fast "on to shoot" time, decent resolution but nothing spectacular or exceptional for the price range, metal construct appears to take moderately rough handling without issue, flash can wash out pic so it requires some familiarity with close-up shots but flash is very good for pics out to 30 feet.  SD storage media door has double securing point to insure waterproof capability (have not experienced any leaks yet), menu is easily accessible and in a familiar format as other Pana/Lumix point n shoot cameras, no lens cover so it can be subjected to scratches over time, nifty little video record button placed right next to shutter button makes it very handy to shoot impromptu video, nice size LCD screen allows you to see "some" details while reviewing pics or framing your next shot, battery life appears very good but haven't maxed out the number of pics or video taken to determine exactly how long or how many pics a fully charged battery can take with/without flash.  Unit shoots good video, quality expected of a camera at this price point.  Overall very satisfied and comparable to my other three Pana/Lumix cameras, specs to price ratio is very good but would have serious reservations if the price were greater than $150.

Reviews.Title: Bulletproof, Versatile and Compact
Reviews.Author: value hunter
Reviews.Content: Go ahead, take a picture in the pool.  Better yet, let your kids take pictures in the pool under the water. What's nice is that you can share this camera with your budding photo enthusiasts without worrying about the camera getting wrecked. Good grief, they can even drop this thing. It has a nice little 5X optical zoom, a battery that holds lots of picture juice, can take HD films, and has a bunch of picture modes for low light, fast action, etc. It's light, easy to carry, easy to use and priced well.  I use it as an alternative to my Nikon for those situations where stellar optics are secondary to other considerations. It's nice to have a camera this versatile.

Reviews.Title: Awesome Camera
Reviews.Author: Angelia Cooper
Reviews.Content: Was scared to use this in a 65 degree spring, thinking that it would take cloudy pictures do to the cold, But the Camera took AWESOME Pictures, even out of water. If i can post pics from the camera I will so you can see. .

Reviews.Title: Tough camera
Reviews.Author: Fred Dagg
Reviews.Content: This little unit does exactly what it is promoted as. Its small and pocketable, whilst being tough and suitable for virtually any environment. Takes pretty good pics and starts up reasonably fast. I could recommend it as a good point and shoot take anywhere camera.

Reviews.Title: Excellent image
Reviews.Author: Alessio Bembo
Reviews.Content: So far I cannot complain: this camera works just fine! I have tried several times under water and even went (accidentally) to 7m depth with no trouble. Obviously the only drawback so far is the limited zoom, but it's part of the design limitation, you cannot have it all... This is an excellent camera to keep in your pocket without worrying about hits or sweat.

Reviews.Title: Best investment ever!!
Reviews.Author: Chanel McLaughlin
Reviews.Content: I have been using this camera on Maui taking a lot of snorkel pictures and they come out beautifully even in murkier waters. Very impressed with its underwater and out side of water capabilities. Shutter speed is pretty fast for a novice photographer and it takes really good low lighting pictures in my opinion. I love the many modes it has and the ease of use.

Reviews.Title: Panasonic Lumix TS20
Reviews.Author: Susan Diane Baan "Susan B"
Reviews.Content: This was a gift for my mother.  Great little camera! It's simple to use and a good value for your money.

Reviews.Title: Waaay Better than the Olympus I had before
Reviews.Author: groovytello
Reviews.Content: Pros:This camera is amazingly clear, user-friendly and dependable for the price!!! I bought it based on price + reviews and I am NOT DISAPPOINTED AT ALL! The photos are vivid and sharp, fast response, and video is just as great with one click recording. So very happy I made this choice.Cons:Battery died after one day of shooting and recording....but it was a LOT of shots and videos, and playbacks. So it's not a complete con. :)Overall: BUY IT! You won't regret it!

Reviews.Title: My son loves it
Reviews.Author: Jeffrey Hauber
Reviews.Content: Bought the camera for my son as a Christmas gift.  It was his selection and he is very pleased with it.

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: Julie Brown
Reviews.Content: Great for outdoor activities!  Took it cross country skiing and had no trouble with the snow or the cold weather.

Reviews.Title: Great Little Camera at Great Price
Reviews.Author: G. Hect "Retired"
Reviews.Content: I got this camera for a trip to Jamaica.  I wanted something I could take in the water.  The disposables were all 35mm and by the time I added in developing costs it just didn't seem economical to go with the 35mm.  The Lumix digital seemed to fit the bill.  I really like this camera.  It took great pictures while on this vacation.  A lot of extra functions for specialized shooting: night, sunset, etc.  I did not take it underwater when I was snorkeling, seemed like a lot just to take a picture of a fish.  But, I did take it on the water excursions and did not have to worry about getting it wet.  It is small, light and takes great pictures.  I am very impressed with this camera.

Reviews.Title: Love it.
Reviews.Author: S Seeliger
Reviews.Content: I really like this camera for several reasons.  It takes clear sharp pictures on land and under water.  We took this camera to Punta Cana to take video's of the sea turtles... turned out great.  I would recomend this camera, and the price is great.

Reviews.Title: Nice
Reviews.Author: Santiago de Loredo
Reviews.Content: La camara esmuy buena, saca buenas fotos y sirve perfectamentepara sacar fotos debajo del agua.Esta muy bien, es unabuena camara

Reviews.Title: MUY BUENA
Reviews.Author: Bonnie Paola Montealegre Henao
Reviews.Content: Muy buena cumplen con todo lo ofrecido por el proveedor, manejan buen tiempo de entrega, muy buen servicio y calidad.

Reviews.Title: Excelente!
Reviews.Author: JULIO ""VILLA""
Reviews.Content: Excelente Calidad del Producto y Buen Precio para Comparar. Tiempo de Entrega en Orden. Esta es una de mis marcas preferidas.

Reviews.Title: Super $99 deal!
Reviews.Author: Harry (SG) Eugene
Reviews.Content: excellent deal to get this rugged camera for daily and sports usage. wish the deal will return to buy one for another family

Reviews.Title: It really is waterproof!
Reviews.Author: A. Forsythe "ashley"
Reviews.Content: I wanted a waterproof camera for our vacation to Cancun a few months ago, as a previous tropical vacation resulted in my camera getting ruined. I also wanted to be able to take a camera under the water for our snorkeling adventures. I was very hesitant and nervous, but after submerging the camera in the water, I was able to take videos and pictures and the quality was really great. I am very happy with this camera; it is a great alternative if you do not want to take your phone with you somewhere.

Reviews.Title: camera
Reviews.Author: Joyce Hawkinson
Reviews.Content: i love it. My granddaughter had one she took to England. So I plan on taking with me on Vac also. hopefully it will survive the beach and water.

Reviews.Title: Good for the active traveler
Reviews.Author: tikiguy
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera for its waterproof/ dust proof/ shock resistant abilities before a trip where we were going to be at the beach a lot and doing some snorkeling. It worked great for traveling due to its small size and light weight, which allowed me to carry it in a pocket of my shorts without even knowing it was there. I actually forgot I had it in my pocket a couple times and used my phones camera instead. It appears to be very durable so far as I bumped it around quite a bit and had it in salt water while we snorkeled and then stowed it with wet, sandy gear on the boat and it held up just fine. The rechargeable battery pack stayed charged for a few days, about 160 pictures, and the camera being left on for sometimes as long as a half an hour at a time. No disappointment there at all. The overall picture quality is not quite as good as my wife's camera, which costs about the same but is not waterproof and slightly bigger. I expect that is due to the relatively small size of the lens on this camera. I did forget to change the setting for underwater pictures so most of them came out with a bluish tint. I also figured out that changing the settings to match the scene is more crucial with this camera than some others and results in a better quality picture than leaving the camera on auto. There are several options. The image stabilization doesn't work quite as well as a couple other cameras we have had, but again it seems to be helped by using a different mode setting rather than auto. Guess the key here is that auto setting is kind of limited. I have had it about 3 months now and overall I am very pleased with it for what I am using it for, really nice snapshots of vacation and day trip traveling from a camera you can actually fit in your pocket without feeling like you have 2 rolls of quarters in there.

Reviews.Title: Great product !
Reviews.Author: Zaraguate
Reviews.Content: Used during the holidays dry/wet and just perfect, the quality of the underwater pictures are fantastic. An extraordinary travel camera for the price!

Reviews.Title: As expected, easy to use.  Does not have alot of bells and whistles
Reviews.Author: Jacob Vizinat
Reviews.Content: We purchased this for my daughter and it works well.  Fairly rugged.  We have not taken it underwater yet so we will see about that at a later date.

Reviews.Title: Waterproof indeed
Reviews.Author: C. Lacambra
Reviews.Content: The camera is small and makes it easy for you to carry around especially at a water park. You can take picture of your kids playing in the water without caring about your camera getting wet. It takes videos too. However, it has very limited features. Don't expect it to be a professional grade camera. It has small lenses so image quality might not be as great, and the glass fogs if you keep it in your pocket so be sure to wipe it off before use. It is a great travel companion to capture those moments in environments that are not friendly to "heavy artillery" cameras.

Reviews.Title: buenisima
Reviews.Author: Luis Enrique Pérez
Reviews.Content: muy buena camara para todo tipo de uso, en mi caso ya la he provado en agua y funciona increible, si la hicieran con mayor zoom optico le daría las 5 estrellas

Reviews.Title: Waterproof camera
Reviews.Author: Will R
Reviews.Content: Gift for my Grandson (8 Yrs).  He can treat it rough and get it wet without damaging or destroying it.  The price was kind of weird.  Got a blue one for $106 while all the other colors were $130+.  He like the blue one and has shoot pics of everything in his path.

Reviews.Title: Durable camera
Reviews.Author: Tom M
Reviews.Content: I'm a home inspector and use a digital camera during inspections. I bought this one because it's durable and I have another Limix that takes great pictures, but while picture quality on this camera is not bad, its definately not great.

Reviews.Title: Exactly as expected
Reviews.Author: aserbant
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for a vacation in New Orleans thinking it would be "vacation proof" and boy did it deliver. I've used it under water with no problems, low light shots are a little weak but what can you expect from a camera with all the features of this bad boy?

Reviews.Title: Good camera,
Reviews.Author: Bryan
Reviews.Content: I brought this a week before I went on vacation to Jamacia, I got it on sale for $119. I must say you get more then your money's worth. I got this mainly because it's waterproof and what not. I'm not that knowledgable of cameras. It takes great pictures and even took a really cool video on a jet ski in the ocean. Then we went snorkeling and took amazing under water and videos even at depths of 15-20 feet deep. I made sure to brush around the outside for sand and then soaked in regular water before taking the battery out to charge. I love this camera is all I need to say, oh and I fell in love with Jamaica.

Reviews.Title: It performs better than what I expected
Reviews.Author: Lin Hu
Reviews.Content: I used it during my Hawaii vacation. Both underwater performance and battery life are good enough. 2 things need to be improved, one is the setting of video taping button, another is the picture quality.

Reviews.Title: DIDNT WORK PROPERLY
Reviews.Author: K. Reed
Reviews.Content: When we opened it and began taking pictures we found that they were spots are over the pics.Tried cleaning lens but spots remained so I returned for a different brand. Would not buy again

Reviews.Title: Great camera. Easy to use and takes excellent photos
Reviews.Author: James Rockafellow
Reviews.Content: We chose this camera for it's durability and ability to go underwater, although shallow depth. It was recommended by a friend who had one, we tried it and liked it.It's also much easier to carry around than my larger DSL camera.

Reviews.Title: Good value!
Reviews.Author: JANINE GUENTHER
Reviews.Content: We bought this camera for our daughter who is starting to experiment with photos in all weather conditions.  She was very happy on our vacation taking pictures at the beach, the pool and on long hikes.  Quality of pictures is good and the compact size of the camera is great.

Reviews.Title: Great Purchase
Reviews.Author: Sebastian
Reviews.Content: Excellent product, very good seller, my order arrived within the stipulated time, recommend to all, five stars seller, I am satisfied with my purchase since buying amazon has always been a pleasant experience. Once you have the product in your hands you can not think of anything else other than you made an excellent choice to disburse money to acquire it. The seller will behave responsibly and comply with the details and shipping details. All Perfect, All good, all amazing.Excelente producto, muy buen vendedor, mi pedido llegó en el tiempo estipulado, lo recomiendo a todos, cinco estrellas al vendedor, estoy satisfecho con mi compra ya que comprar en amazon siempre ha sido una experiencia agradable. Una vez tienes el producto en tus manos no puedes pensar en otra cosa que no sea que hiciste una excelente elección al desembolsar dinero por adquirirlo. El vendedor se comporto responsable y cumplió con los detalles del producto y los detalles del envío. All Perfect, All good, all amazing.

Reviews.Title: satisfactory camera
Reviews.Author: Nguyen Mong Thuy Khanh
Reviews.Content: With its reasonable price, I am tottaly satisfied with its quality. The orange color in reality looks nicer than in the pic.Even though I have not tried underwater yet, I have to say that I love it...

Reviews.Title: 16 MP never looked so bad
Reviews.Author: Jason I
Reviews.Content: I have no idea why a camera with that many MPs takes such poor pictures.  I guess it is just shabby material.  It is definitely waterproof.  I used it in the pool and ocean while on vacation.  The pictures just look washed out.  It is hard to describe but as many people said in other reviews, the picture quality is an issue.  There again it is a waterproof camera for a little over a $100.  I guess something had to give.  I do think it is worth the price though.

Reviews.Title: Gotta love it!
Reviews.Author: Micheal Rettig "Mikey likes it!"
Reviews.Content: I love this little camera, and yes, previous reviews lead me to purchase this camera. It really does take exceptional pictures.

Reviews.Title: Water plus camera
Reviews.Author: SB
Reviews.Content: This was the best idea I've had in a long time! Bought this before trip to Austrailia. It is small, good photos in and out of water. Used in ocean and freshwater. Night and day holiday pics.It required reading instructions well for use and care after under water salt water pics, but indeed best pics we have from three of Us. Kinda would like zoom to be tad easier to use while in a hurry or underwater as could be slow. But still very capable and well used on our trip.  Happy we bought it.

Reviews.Title: Panasonic Lumix TS20
Reviews.Author: C. Bayne ".jpn"
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera because I wanted to get a waterproof one. I'm returning it though because I found a good deal with the Sony TX20 and the Sony comes with better resolution video. If you want a cheap waterproof camera, this is a good buy. This is definitely not a primary camera as the pictures are ok. I'm no photographer so I don't know any terms or anything but the pictures don't seem to be as good as my other cameras that I've had. If you follow the instructions to keeping the camera waterproof, I don't think you will have any problems, it looks to be pretty sound. So for a good cheap secondary that you don't have to worry about easily breaking, I would recommend buying this camera. I would buy for < $120 because it seems to be on sale a lot and if you aren't in a rush, save a little bit of $$.CJB

Reviews.Title: Nice for the price
Reviews.Author: Erica Cope
Reviews.Content: Got this camera and it was amazing while it worked. then after a few months it just stopped working. The flash stopped first then some of the buttons stopped responding, and finally it just stopped takeing pictures. It would turn on and off but that was about it.  So I had to send it in for repairs. They ended up just sending out a new camera to me. Hopeing it was a fluke because I loved this camera while it was functional.

Reviews.Title: Grandma's gift
Reviews.Author: savysixty
Reviews.Content: Grandma's gift was thourghly researched and approved by father and given on Christmas Day to young Grandaughter who had no trouble at all learning to operate and taking picktures of everybody and everything.  The family was very pleased with the camera.  However, the color given and shown was described as blue but the camera was rather aqua and the blue cost more.  I would highly recommend camera for any shutterbug.

Reviews.Title: A Winner
Reviews.Author: no1intex
Reviews.Content: My Granddaughter wanted a camera for her project work. This Panasonic Lumix TS20 16.1 MP is exactly what she needed and wanted. Well designed and has the cool features she appreciated. I am glad I found this on Amazon

Reviews.Title: christmas present to myself
Reviews.Author: donna rizzo
Reviews.Content: I have been comparing prices for an underwater camera all year. I was going to get one for christmas no matter what. when i saw this 3 hour deal on amazon, my finger spang into action! I love it! it works perfectly in or out of water. what a bargin!

Reviews.Title: GREAT!!
Reviews.Author: Juan Carlos Reyes
Reviews.Content: EXCELLENT PRODUCT!!!  WHEN  TAKE A PICTURE BEHIND OF GLASS WOW  I SUGGESTRECORD VIDEO IN HD WITH ZOOM  UNTIL 16X  I LOVE IT

Reviews.Title: Very good camera with a very good price
Reviews.Author: LKT67
Reviews.Content: Worked very well on our cruise.  Very waterproof and took excellent underwater photos; however, sometimes the pictures otherwise were a little grainy.  Could be that I just didn't have it on proper settings.

Reviews.Title: nice little camera
Reviews.Author: Luna Serrano
Reviews.Content: We bought this for a trip to Puerto Rico. It worked great! We took it to the beach and on a caving tour we did. It worked really well and the screen always prompts you to double check the camera is locked, for the water settings. We plan to bring this on many trips to come.

Reviews.Title: Very good choice for your money
Reviews.Author: Norberto H. Vergani
Reviews.Content: I've paid for it $137.98 on Novembre 2012 (now I see different prices). It's absolutely an excellent choice. The best waterproof camera you can have for that money. All around is a very good camera too, nice pictures, 16.1 MP, a decent flash, 4X optical zoom, easy to use, good battery life. I deeply recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Nice for general use !!!
Reviews.Author: Min Kutha
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for my general use as it is waterproof and Anti-Shock Performance. I wanted a waterproof camera so I wouldn't have to worry about ruining it in rain, snow, dirt, or anything else I throw at it.It is cheap anyway.

Reviews.Title: Excellent gadget for familiar photographs
Reviews.Author: Jorge Torres Moreno
Reviews.Content: A very complete camera with an excellent price for all occasions. Have no regrets with it. You can buy it with no doubts.

Reviews.Title: excellent digital camera
Reviews.Author: tirso leon
Reviews.Content: digitala excellent waterproof camera, everything you look for in a camera in style, entreg time and excellent packaging according to what is offered. I recommend it 100%

Reviews.Title: ok so far
Reviews.Author: Anthony J. Hitchings
Reviews.Content: arrived promptly in excellent conditionused it once, really, in Zion's Virgin River Narrows - under VERY difficult lighting conditionsI did not do the camera justice by having a week prior to get used to it - it was a last minute purchasemain reason for chosing this camera was the correct price point on features and being waterproofthis camera allows water to get behind the body palter - by design - I'm not sure how that would fare in sandy conditions in the long run

Reviews.Title: Great cheap cam
Reviews.Author: Rivera
Reviews.Content: This camera worked out perfectly in the sea. The price is really low and the performance is good enough to have nice trip pictures. If you want no water in it, follow the instructions.

Reviews.Title: Great camera for a great price!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Bought this camera because I was going snorkeling during my cruise excurisons and wanted to take some underwater photos.  Camera is easy to operate, lightweight and takes great pictures.  The underwater photos I took came out amazing. Would reccomend it to anyone not wanting a complicated or expensive waterproof camera..

Reviews.Title: More than expected
Reviews.Author: Arthur L. Berkowitz "Enron author"
Reviews.Content: Last time I went to Tahiti, I bought a throw away camera; so were the pictures. This time I bought the Lumix TS 20 and the color and clarity were fabulous. Several needed a little "enhancement" but the program that comes with the Panasonic cameras is great for that. If you haven't used Media Impressions software by Arcsoft I strongly recommend it. It is a lot easier to use than Photoshop and unless you are a professional it does everything I need it to do.I never had a leakage problem with the camera and even the above water photos were good; not as good as my better Panasonic camera, but would you expect that form a camera that is less than 1/3 the price.

Reviews.Title: Poor Quality photos
Reviews.Author: YeahItsMe72
Reviews.Content: I bought this as a gift due to it's 4 out of 5 star rating.  I really can't see how people are rating it so high.  The pictures it takes look similar to what I used to take on pre smart-phone phones.The person I bought this for was thankful but I could tell after seeing the photos she was disappointed.  I was too.  We're now looking for a replacement camera as I'm embarrassed I bought such a poor camera as a gift for someone.

Reviews.Title: Great Little camera
Reviews.Author: R. Farley "skullmunkey"
Reviews.Content: I bought this to have something to slip in my pocket when I go to comic conventions. It works great for that. It turns on quickly. It's easy enough to operate one handed if you have to, and it takes pretty good pictures too.

Reviews.Title: Another lumix
Reviews.Author: Ronaldo
Reviews.Content: I have already 2 lumix cameras of different model and this one is a nice addition to the lumix collection. Very nice product , small and slim and waterproof.

Reviews.Title: good article
Reviews.Author: manuel
Reviews.Content: to receive and open it seems of good quality wine in a box well protected. The number of stars not complete because I have not completely exceeds my expectations

Reviews.Title: Love this camera
Reviews.Author: Pru "Pru"
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for a vacation to Barbados, but also plan to use it while hiking as I live in the Seattle are where it rains quite a bit. The pictures I took both underwater and above water are great with only a slight variation from my non-waterproof Lumix camera. (I almost destroyed the non-waterproof camera taking it to Ice Caves near me and using it to photograph Bald Eagles in the area.) The camera is lightweight with a bunch of different filter options. The video capture is also impressive.

Reviews.Title: I LOVE it!
Reviews.Author: Liudmila Lebedeva
Reviews.Content: This camera works magic! I bought it as a present as I am sure about the thing now. I have had my own one for 2 years so far and I just LOVE it.

Reviews.Title: Works awesome in the ocean
Reviews.Author: Mike Shoty "Shoty"
Reviews.Content: I used this on a surfing trip to take some amateur in water surfing shots. They were amazing photos better than i expected. The camera was able to take fast movement in water without showing much blur at all. The build quality is SOLID. This definitely gets a 10 in my book.

Reviews.Title: Panasonic Lumix
Reviews.Author: Miguel Pittol
Reviews.Content: El producto lo recibí en muy buenas condiciones y me parece muy bueno.se recominda el articulo Panasonic Lumix TS20 16.1 MP TOUGH Waterproof Digital Camera with 4x...

Reviews.Title: Nice Camera
Reviews.Author: e&f;
Reviews.Content: Nice camera for the money.  Haven't had it long, but so far we are happy with the camera. the color is nice too!

Reviews.Title: Great camera!
Reviews.Author: greyna
Reviews.Content: This has to be the best camera i've ever bought. As a year round lifeguard and swim instructor it comes in very handy around the pool. The pictures come out great in the water and out of the water. It is very durable and i love all the features on the camera.

Reviews.Title: GREAT CAMERA,
Reviews.Author: James Bargender
Reviews.Content: WE BOUGHT THIS CAMERA BEFORE GOING ON VACATION, ME AND MY KIDS LOVED THE PICTURES WE TOOK UNDER WATER, GREAT PICTURES.. EASY TO USE EVEN MY EIGHT YEAR OLD CAN USE IT..

Reviews.Title: Camera
Reviews.Author: Paul Greischar
Reviews.Content: I think that this camera works fine  i like how it has the safety lock door for the battery and the SD memory  It has good focusing and the settings work very well. The only thing is that the flash does not go very far but besides that it works fine

Reviews.Title: Not waterproof - used it only once!
Reviews.Author: S. M "Serge"
Reviews.Content: This camera is not waterproof. Worked fine the first time. Next day it started popping "Insert SD card" message and some of the controls stopped working. Will try to return to Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Compact, Waterproof and Drop resistant
Reviews.Author: RDD
Reviews.Content: Carried this on recent 20 day Central Europe trip.  Dropped couple of times no problem.  Takes good pics.  Will test it's beach capabilities in 2013 expect it will do well.

Reviews.Title: Don't Buy The Lumix TS20
Reviews.Author: Joe Navarro "Spycatcher"
Reviews.Content: Having read the reviews which were mixed and some warned me, I purchased the camera thinking I would have luck. I didn't. Handling it as carefully as a baby, it worked fine above water but within one hour of snorkeling with it in 4 feet of water, it began to do weird things like flash the image on the screen rather than hold an image. It then went into a cycle mode memory to menu. It simply went crazy. Never dropped, never mishandled. When opened it was dry in the battery compartment but there is no explanation other than water got into the deeper parts as other reviews suggest - there are other apertures such as the speaker and buttons. Warranty period ran out so there is nothing I can do. Seriously dont waste your money, the camera is not tough at all, it is in fact delicate. You will throw your money away as I did.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Colette S,
Reviews.Content: Bought this camera to take on two vacation in Caribbean.  It was great! Never once did it get any water inside the case.  We charged it a couple of times and download pictures from it without a problem.  Pictures and videos were clear.  I'm sold on this camera.  Great for the price.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic underwater pictures!
Reviews.Author: Deb C
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my daughter who lives in Florida and is always in the water.  She LOVES the camera and how great the pictures are!

Reviews.Title: AWESOME!
Reviews.Author: Caity
Reviews.Content: Really love this camera!  I haven't had a chance to test it in the water yet but I'm sure it'll be fine.  The pictures are great and it has a really easy interface that is simple to learn.

Reviews.Title: Birthday gift
Reviews.Author: bug
Reviews.Content: My husband bought me this camera and I absolutely love it. Takes great pictures and its definitely a durable camera.

Reviews.Title: Great little durable camera
Reviews.Author: MJH
Reviews.Content: My little girl is 5 years old an absolute shutterbug. She has been asking over and over for a camera so we took the plunge on this model. It is durable, has survived a few large drops already, waterproof, and takes pretty decent pictures. For anyone looking for a great starter camera that can take abuse, this is a great find.

Reviews.Title: Good for the money!
Reviews.Author: alex
Reviews.Content: Great little point and shoot that will fit in your pocket, and doesn't require you to read the manual ;-)Picture quality is good, good price.

Reviews.Title: Good little camera that lived up to my expectations.
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: We took this camera on our Caribbean cruise. We used it in the ocean with no problems. The pictures are good. I think it is a good little camera for underwater use.!

Reviews.Title: works great
Reviews.Author: Rachel S. Dalzell
Reviews.Content: My family used this all week in freshwater, saltwater, warm water, and cold water. It worked great in all circumstances and is very easy to use. We got some amazing snorkeling pictures and had a great time doing underwater videos of us diving. It is absolutely worth the price and I am very happy with the results.

Reviews.Title: Panasonic Lumix
Reviews.Author: Lace
Reviews.Content: This seems like it will be a good camera however didn't realize that it only can go into max depth of 16 feet for only a few hours at a time.

Reviews.Title: Exactly what we wanted
Reviews.Author: Jennifer Le
Reviews.Content: The Lumix TS20 is perfect for our needs.  We are an active tropical family and love the rainforest and the ocean.  We surf, snorkel, kayak, hike in the rainforest (sometimes it's raining - imagine that) and play in the river.  My 13 year old grandson wanted a camera for his birthday so I got him this one.  We all avoided taking our cameras with us on many of our adventures (after a few casualties) so I bought him this one in hopes of being able to record more of our fun.  The first day we opened it, my grandson used it to create a claymation video.  He got modeling clay all over the camera, in the grooves, etc. and we were worried that he had already ruined it.  No problem, it cleaned right up for our trip to the beach where we took it into the ocean for surfing pictures.  We took underwater pics and pics from the surfboard.  The camera stood up well to quite a beating in the salty surf.  The pictures turned out well and the camera is no worse for wear. My grandson left it out on the porch one night and it rained through the night.  He has had it in the ocean and on the sandy beach.  Each time, it cleaned up easily following the instructions provided.  This is a tough little camera that has so far been able to take whatever we dished out.  He also got a floating wrist strap for it so if he accidentally drops it in the water it will float.  That's working well, too.  He loves his camera and it has become the family's camera of choice for all our adventures.In addition to all that, I got it at a great price.  I highly recommend the Lumix TS20 for people with an active outdoor lifestyle.

Reviews.Title: bougth as a gift
Reviews.Author: bigblur "bigblur"
Reviews.Content: My brother in law seemed to really like it.He was taking it back to Brazil...haven't heard how it's been working down there, but i did get to play with it a bit here.It's way faster than my costco special Olympus that's ~3 years old now.Made me consider picking on up myself.

Reviews.Title: very good I like itvery good I like itvery good I like itvery good I like itvery good I like itvery good I like itvery good I li
Reviews.Author: BaoluWang
Reviews.Content: very good I like itvery good I like itvery good I like itvery good I like itvery good I like itvery good I like itvery good I like itvery good I like itvery good I like itvery good I like it  very useful  I  should  buy

Reviews.Title: Great Camera So Far
Reviews.Author: Da 808 State
Reviews.Content: Love this camera, bought this to replace a dying Casio camera.  The only gripe I really have about this, is the bracketing shot function.  This camera can only take bracketing shots at 3 megapixels instead of the 16 megapixels.  Also the quality of picture doesn't seem to follow the mold of Panasonic Lumix camera.  But I did pay less than $150, and it's only when I take pictures at night where the quality of pictures don't hold true.  But for a point and shoot camera, this one definitely does its job.  Great camera, awesome design, and love the majority of the features (especially the panoramic shot function)

Reviews.Title: Great camera for the price
Reviews.Author: aglowucannotsee "aglowucannotsee"
Reviews.Content: My wife and I got this camera for our cruise to Cozumel, Belize, Roatan, and Grand Cayman. We took about 500 photos with it on the trip, and took another 500 or so with our Panazonic Lumix LX5. For the money and for being waterproof, you get great quality photos with this camera. Our LX5 takes photos with more vibrant color and slightly better resolution, but it's a more expensive camera with a better lens.We took the TS20 underwater while snorkeling in a couple of places and it performed with no problems. You can't see the screen too great underwater, so you end up just snapping a lot and picking out the good shots. I don't think the visibility of the screen is so much a fault of the camera, as I don't think any LCD screen would be easy to see underwater through a snorkel mask. Overall I think it's a great pick for a waterproof camera in this price range.

Reviews.Title: LOVED IT!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Beautiful "Starr"
Reviews.Content: I purchased the camera to my 1st out of the country trip, without even testing it. I was pleased and the LIFE of the party, in the water while using this camera. Everyone came to me asking is that waterrpoof,is that water proof, LOL. It's light weight and took WONDERFUL pictures under water!

Reviews.Title: We love this little camera!
Reviews.Author: J. Wilkey
Reviews.Content: We bought this camera to take on a two-day bicycle trip thinking we might need it to be waterproof.  We didn't get to go on the trip, but we have used it many times anyway and have found it to be very easy to use.  It has a lot of functions on it - very similar to my larger Nikon camera.  We highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Good waterproof technology, easy to use, poor picture quality
Reviews.Author: Greg
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera to take with me into the field so I had a lightweight durable camera to take pictures of sample collection sites.  This was relatively inexpensive and definitely durable enough to fit the bill.However, the picture quality was really quite poor.  The pictures were dull in color and not sharp. As a camera for scientific field collection it is great, but I would never subsitute this camera for a better point and shoot or SLR when good quality photos are desired.Pros: Light weight, cool design, easy to use, inexpensive, durableCons: Poor photo quality (flat color, dull)

Reviews.Title: great little camera!!!
Reviews.Author: Grace
Reviews.Content: This camera is a total champ!! I have used it in every circumstance imaginable, including freezing winds, snow, rain, fog, underwater, and even swam around the Blue Lagoon in Iceland with it in my hand for hours! I am very impressed with it and would definitely recommend it :)

Reviews.Title: super happy with it!
Reviews.Author: Dw
Reviews.Content: I love this little camera. Its compact and ready to use whenever you need a good, indestructible and reliable camera.I bought it for our hawaii vacation and it spent a great deal of time deep in salt water and came out unscathed and with memories we will be able to share forever!we took some underwater videos of reefs and fish and they came out wonderful and in good quality. I am happy with the level of light that it pics up even with being underwater. Its not AS great at night in combination with movement and at some fire dances I had to take lots of pictures to get the ones that I wanted.. but I did get them. I am just stating this, but not adding it as a defect to the cameras performance, i expected less and was pleased with what I got from the night!I has a great seal and it compact.I love that I have a little camera I can keep in my car now and feel good about taking to to beach . I have a toddler so its also good to feel like i have a camera that he cant shatter if he gets his paws on it!I would completely recommend this camera, I think the price is great for what it is!

Reviews.Title: I like it!
Reviews.Author: Amanda P
Reviews.Content: I ordered this camera over summer and haven't had any problems with it. It is definitely waterproof, hasn't broken it. The picture looks exactly like the camera.

Reviews.Title: Strong, good to handle and great movies and pictures
Reviews.Author: Felipe
Reviews.Content: All metal made, very strong, great images (pictures and videos) and sound. Easy to carry, very thin. Interesting amount of features.

Reviews.Title: Perfect budget tough camera
Reviews.Author: austin_fan
Reviews.Content: I used this camera while on vacation in Hawaii and to take pictures during Hurricane Sandy.  The camera worked fantastically in water or in crazy weather.  The colors are a little off compared to similarly priced compact cameras (not waterproof) or more expensive tough cameras, butt for the price and the ability to take it underwater its worth it.  The underwater pictures come out better if you're closer to the object, the colors are a lot more vivid.  The camera does seem sensitive to rapid changes in humidity, but I followed the directions for drying it out and it was back to functioning in less than 30 minutes.  For the price I paid, I'm really happy with this camera.

Reviews.Title: good
Reviews.Author: Fernando Giron
Reviews.Content: bello hermoso encantador beautifull good nice very good pretty solido divertido lo mejor q me ha pasado en la vida

Reviews.Title: Love playing with all the features.
Reviews.Author: G. Li "Asianmisty"
Reviews.Content: The panoramic took a while to get use to, but took some really nice photos. The pictures through glass feature was very handy at the aquarium.

Reviews.Title: So Far So Good!
Reviews.Author: Rin
Reviews.Content: Don't have any complaints.  I bought this camera for work (I work on film sets and I ALWAYS drop my cameras because there is so much to juggle).  I actually did drop the Lumix on set this week and there wasn't even a scratch!  Nice to know I'm a little more protected . . .

Reviews.Title: Amazing Camera
Reviews.Author: PCHoy
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my honeymoon and it was perfect. It took great pictures and can be used in water. Love it!

Reviews.Title: Died for no reason
Reviews.Author: D. Grout
Reviews.Content: This camera worked fine for several months, underwater and above water.  Now, after a month of sitting on the shelf, it will not turn on.  Nothing.  Fully charged battery, no water inside.  It just stopped working.

Reviews.Title: Big upgrade for me
Reviews.Author: gizzy
Reviews.Content: I really like it. It is easy to use and because its tough, I worry less about it. After using a camera phone for years, I love the quality of the pictures. Great for someone like me.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera!
Reviews.Author: Julie
Reviews.Content: All I can say is I am so glad I decided to by this camera.  After much research and much delima on all the negative comments my husband and I decided to buy this for our Honeymoon cruise to Grand Turk Island.  I am sooooo glad I did!  Not only did the underwater pics turn out great, the regular photos are clear and crisp.  We have a large Nikon with all the bells and whistles and didn't want to take that on the Island.  This camera was the perfect substitute for what we were doing. It made the underwater power snorkeling more memeorable then ever.  We swam with "Ashley" the baracuda and now have pics to proove that she was with us the whole time out in the ocean.  We never would have had those picture memories if I had just bought a cheap underwater disposable camera. This camera is worth the money, small, compact and I bought a floaty wrist band for it so it wouldn't sink in the ocean.  My pics turned out amazing and those pics helped complete our honeymoon!

Reviews.Title: great water proof camera!
Reviews.Author: kyle
Reviews.Content: I went though a number of water proof cameras before this one, fuji and Olympus mostly.  Having numours and annoying buying and returning, I desiced to order the TS20 after reading reviews on amazon and consumer reports (another great source for product reviews) This camera scored reitivaly high compared to other water proof camera.When I tryed it out, I loved it instantly. Its very responsive, takes great pictures, and quick, fast start up time, is compact, and the menu is easily to guide through,  highly recommend this camera. amazing value for the price

Reviews.Title: Great camera, better than I had expected!
Reviews.Author: Jolieorange
Reviews.Content: I had done a lot of research when thinking about buying a waterproof camera. Then it came to Nikon (with GPS feature, the only provider for that), Fuji (claimed to shoot a clear picture underwater and having colorful and chic look), and Panasonic (with common features but very cheaper than the other two).Later I found out from many reviews that you could still have a problem of water leaking  into any camera if you didn't follow the instruction strictly. Then I decided to buy Panasonic Lumix because it was cheaper and it shouldn't be that bad.Then surprisingly, in my first trip to snorkeling in Hawaii, I took the pictures with this camera. And the pictures underwater turned out to be great and clear! Better than I had expected. The key is you need to take your camera close enough to what you want to shoot on. For example if you want to make a headshot of yourself underwater, make you it's close enough to your armlength. If you want to take a picture of a fish and coral, make sure it's not far than 2-3 feet. Also I guess the sun on that day might help too. Because I went snorkeling at noon.Then I went home and cleaning this machine in room-temperature fresh water as directed in the instruction then left it to dry. Then I opened it, using the brush given to make sure there was no sand or anything in the battery slot, removed the battery, recharing it and put it back. Then I could turn it on without any problem. You just need to make sure also when using it underwater, the lock button is still locked well. Then it shouldn't be any problem. I love this camera!

Reviews.Title: A decent and cheap waterproof camera
Reviews.Author: GanCW
Reviews.Content: I wanted a waterproof camera for my vacation and this model has what I need and is priced very reasonably - $129.44.  For this price, I find the camera exceeded my expectation.  Quality of photo is good (not as good as DLSR but this is to be expected) and it works well under water. Macro shots from this camera is acceptable.  I have no complaints and pleased with this camera.

Reviews.Title: Excellent camera. I have no complaints at all.
Reviews.Author: Alex Varela Larios
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera two weeks ago and today I finally use it during a family-weekend trip to the beach. I took excellent pictures with this camera, it works quite well. I have no complaints at all, it is afordable and very useful, my favorite words. This camera is extremely recommendable.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Arizonajones
Reviews.Content: I brought this camera for a cruise to Mexico and to replace the camera I use for hiking and backpacking. I love the fact it is waterproof, shock proof and dust proof. These features combined with its lightweight and compact design make it perfect for outdoor activities like hiking or camping. It's also the perfect travel camera as it fits into pockets easily and does not need a case to protect it. The pictures are clear, the video is good and it's easy and fast to use.

Reviews.Title: Panasonic Lumix TS20 tough Waterproof Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: Terry
Reviews.Content: I have not tried getting it wet, but it is a nice point and shoot type camera. It is easy to use and fits nicely into jacket or cargo pants pockets. The battery lasts a long time. Panasonic Lumix TS20 16.1 MP TOUGH Waterproof Digital Camera with 4x Optical Zoom (Orange)

Reviews.Title: great little camera!
Reviews.Author: alecia
Reviews.Content: this is a fun and very easy to use camera. a couple of the functions like auto flash on/off are a little tricky to get used to but it takes great pictures; video; and underwater shots! It has a long battery life for lots of pictures.

Reviews.Title: Horrible don't waste your money
Reviews.Author: Rich
Reviews.Content: Got the camera for my honeymoon by day two the camera had water in it. We followed the instructions had the lock on and it still got water in it and quit working.

Reviews.Title: Awsome Camera
Reviews.Author: Doodlebuggers
