Reviews.Content: We bought these for our field techs.  Durable and takes great pics and videos.  Best deal out there for rugged camera.

Reviews.Title: Great waterproof for the price point
Reviews.Author: J Gillion
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera specifically so i can have it stuffed in the front pocket of my lifejacket when kayaking. I've used it about 6 times and it been great to have it at the ready and not have to care about it. My mantra has been the old saying... the best camera is one you have on you.The TS20 pretty much does what it says on the box but my only gripe is the images can be a bit noisy and soft especially in low light. But hey, it was $139 so I'm not expecting a miracle.If you want a waterproof camera with no frills then this fits the bill. If its your only camera and your source for printing precious family photos then I would do yourself a favour and spend a bit more - or invest in 2 cameras.

Reviews.Title: do not buy
Reviews.Author: gil3moj
Reviews.Content: Batt. died after only 15 pics, out snorkleing, no place to charge, belive should have lasted at least a day, had it on charger night before indicated full charge, but.....sent it back when we returned from a cruise, WITHOUT PICS

Reviews.Title: Excellent camera
Reviews.Author: Jennifer Shiner
Reviews.Content: I love this camera...it's easy to use and seems very durable. Works great in water and out of water and pictures are very clear. Very easy to use and a lot of options. Would definitely buy again! Had an olympus waterproof camera in past and it was terrible. But this camera is wonderful!

Reviews.Title: panasonic lumix ts20
Reviews.Author: grandma
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for a trip to Brazil and the Iguazu Falls.  We were soaked and the camera performed great.  We also used for a kayak trip there.  This camera is a great value for the money.

Reviews.Title: Poor Picture Quality
Reviews.Author: Veronica Medina-gillies "vmgillies"
Reviews.Content: don't buy this camera if you want quality.  you might as well buy a disposable camera if you are looking to have a waterproof camera for some occasion.  This camera has made me sad since the previous Lumix camera had such good photo quality, even with fewer Megapixels.

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: martha
Reviews.Content: I was so happy when I got my camera in the mail.It came faster than what I expected. The pictures are nice and clear.I am very happy with it !

Reviews.Title: Happy with my decision
Reviews.Author: Mom2M&P; "Carolina Girl 09"
Reviews.Content: I debated between the Panasonic Lumix DMC-TS20 and the Olympus TG-310.  I used my friend's Olympus TG-310 on a trip and found I didn't feel like I could get a good picture even with switching settings and making adjustments.  I did not want a camera that I had to constantly adjust because I knew that I would miss a lot of good photo opps while making adjustments.  I read a lot of reviews and decided to go with the Panasonic.  So far I am happy with my decision.  I used it on a weekend trip the first weekend I got it and found it took good underwater pics as well as indoor and outdoor pics.  I am a realist and understand that I am not going to get the same quality pics that I get from a DSLR camera.  As long as you consider that and take some time to familiarize yourself with it, I think anyone would be happy with the pictures this camera takes.  It fits in my pocket which I also love versus my current bulky camera.  I am also excited to use this camera on a trip to Florida next week where I plan to use it at Discovery Cove as well as all the other parks.  On our last trip there it rained quite a bit and I didn't get pics of some things I wanted to.  Looking forward to that not being an issue on this trip!!  Battery life was decent.  I bought an extra battery and SD card so that I wouldn't have an issue with letting it dry after using it in water.....something to think about if you are looking to buy this camera.  Overall I am pleased with my purchase!

Reviews.Title: Great waterproof camera for the price!
Reviews.Author: kcdelaney
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for a trip to the Bahamas.  It's compact and easy to use, takes pretty good photos and videos and works well in its waterproof capacity completely submerged.  I suggest you get the floating strap along with this if you plan to spend any time in the ocean...makes it much easier to hang on to.  Overall, a great camera for the price!

Reviews.Title: SUPER
Reviews.Author: JAIME
Reviews.Content: Camera is a simple but extremely versatile. LAS underwater photos are beautiful, the recording quality is excellent .... I recommend very good price and it is best not to call attention but is excellent.

Reviews.Title: Failed twice
Reviews.Author: gkjake
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera twice--the first time it locked up on me completely after only one use --none of the buttons would work and it wouldn't turn off so I returned it thinking it was a one time glitch.  Second camera came in and after two uses it did almost exactly the same thing.  This time all the buttons worked except the power button and we couldn't turn it off.  We love everything about this camera other than the fact it failed for us twice.  We are now looking for other options.

Reviews.Title: leaked
Reviews.Author: Mike
Reviews.Content: leaked first time out, depth shallow to 10', perhaps a water resistant camera not meant to be taken into the water?

Reviews.Title: A low end camera and not rugged and watertight...try the TS4
Reviews.Author: SRQZoo
Reviews.Content: I purchased the camera and it was not watertight! I contacted Panasonic and they would only repair if I paid shipping costs. The camera was brand new! Unfortunately, I purchased from another company (not Amazon) and they would not refund my money either. I will be purchasing local or from Amazon from now on. I had Pentax waterproof cameras for 5+ years without an issue. This camera had water inside the battery/memory card area during use which shorted it out. The photos also were not clear when used before testing in water. I am not sure why this camera was rated so highly. Our Pentax (older model) took much better video and photos with a much wider angle lens and superior zoom.UPDATED: I ended up mailing the camera back (at my expense). To my surprise, Panasonic mailed me back the TS4 camera. This camera is about double the cost of the camera I returned. I was pleasantly surprised, but still a bit concerned about it being waterproof. Thankfully, the new camera hasn't had any problems so far. The TS4 seems to be made better overall. I was surprised by the way Panasonic handled the return. While it was unfortunate that they would not cover return shipping, I feel the upgrade more than made up for the inconvenience. Time will tell as to how well the TS4 holds up in ocean/pool water.

Reviews.Title: Lasted a year-and-a-half
Reviews.Author: Yo "Yo"
Reviews.Content: OK, that's not the end of the world, and it was fine while it lasted.  Still, for $150 you might expect something that lasts a bit longer ...

Reviews.Title: Disappointed Failure
Reviews.Author: B. Easton
Reviews.Content: I used this camera once while snorkeling (So maximum 2 feet deep).  I followed all the rules and checks, including locking it up.  The screen started to look odd towards the end of use about 60 mins of use.  I was  able to pull all the pictures off the card by inserting it into the computer.  After recharging the battery, and putting everything back in the camera, I was ready to go for day 2.  Sadly, nothing worked.  Camera was completely dead.  I am returning it for a refund, and not getting a replacement.  Thankfully it was within Amazon's 30 day return period.I found a $40 underwater camera at Walmart on my vacation that looks like a high school science project, you can see the wires inside!  I was leery of buying it, but thought it was worth the gamble.  What a great choice that was.... it took pictures just as good as the Panasonic, and could even do video.  So I will stick with my inexpensive science project of a camera for my next underwater picture taking.

Reviews.Title: 1 use and done
Reviews.Author: Robert Maxwell
Reviews.Content: I bought this a while back for a cruise. Used it snorkeling took great pictures, came home put it away since I don't need a water proof camera for everyday use. Went to Disney 2 weeks ago charged the battery all lights on. Went to use it in a water park nothing nada ziltich. Waste of money. Tried to return it but ofcourse not to much time has past

Reviews.Title: Panasonic is not a company that backs up it product! Camera is not waterproof!
Reviews.Author: Gene V Rossi
Reviews.Content: Camera took in water. Called and sent back to manufacturer. No response for weeks after a ridiculous amount of messages and emails concerning the status of repair and or replacement. Never spoke to a human. Run don't walk to another waterproof camera!

Reviews.Title: Not so good
Reviews.Author: Paulina Garcï¿½s
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera last November and it worked fine, 2 weeks ago I took it to the beach and took some great pictures underwater but after rinsing it and waiting for an hour the lens became foggy and after some pictures it finally broke down.

Reviews.Title: Great gift
Reviews.Author: Jim lee
Reviews.Content: Gave them to kids in our Burn Camp as gifts for their trip to Washington DC. they all loved them.

Reviews.Title: DO NOT BUY!! SAVE FOR A GO PRO
Reviews.Author: Elizabeth Reininger
Reviews.Content: Read the reviews, most positive reviews come from owners who have used this camera for less than a year. Well, the year mark is coming up on our Panasonic water proof (haha) camera and it no longer is waterproof. I followed the manufactures directions to a t and it is somehow getting moisture inside when used underwater. Yes, it worked great for 11 months...but I think it should have lasted at least a few years. Decent pics, but in my opinion save for a go pro. We have one of those as well and a year and a half later it still works. DONT BUY this piece of crap

Reviews.Title: lumix camera
Reviews.Author: battle
Reviews.Content: Its ok for a cheap camera.  But im pretty disappointed with the purchase.  Target had the same camera $100 cheaper.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Mason
Reviews.Content: I had to get my girlfriend a very durable camera and this one fits the bills. The great thing about this camera is the lens doesn't come out of the front so it will not break if it powers on while in your pocket.

Reviews.Title: Splashproof, not Waterproof ! DO NOT BUY IF YOU INTEND TO SUBMERGE IT
Reviews.Author: Gozke
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for my trip to Hawaii and capture all the underwater action. Used it 5 times at most exclusively for water shots and glup glup... water leak. Left to dry 2 days and although turns on, it became a zombie! pictures are washed out (light sensor). I own a panasonic undewater camera case so I am kind of used to the drill of underwater cameras: check for any debris in the seal, clean the seal, etc. but this camera is a joke in that matter. DO NOT BUY IF YOU INTEND TO SUBMERGE IT. This camera is waaaaayyyyyyyy to cheap for that.

Reviews.Title: Greay Camera!
Reviews.Author: Alan Schlesinger
Reviews.Content: Is just as the seller said it was! Excellent image stabilization and quality picture taking. I have another Panasonic camera with the same Leica lens and both take great pictures and videos.

Reviews.Title: Ok, not great, better than a stick in the eye!
Reviews.Author: Rachael
Reviews.Content: This camera is a great size and the fact that it is waterproof, dust proof, and freeze proof is super handy.  It would be better if it used regular batteries instead of a specific camera battery.  Also, the picture quality in standard auto mode isn't reliable.  The panoramic is great!  Ok for the price, but it's not the best camera out there.

Reviews.Title: Love this camera
Reviews.Author: Terri J. Morgan
Reviews.Content: I love this camera. I bought it so I could take pictures in the ocean while doing Stand Up Paddling, and have been very pleased with the camera. It's light weight, and very easy to use, which is a plus when you're balancing on a surfboard. I've gotten it wet a couple of times, and haven't had any problems. I wish it had come with a neck strap instead of a wrist strap, but I was able to pick up one at my local camera store.

Reviews.Title: Should have purchased a long time ago!
Reviews.Author: Gumby
Reviews.Content: Great camera. It does everything it claims and great pictures! I've used this at the beach, in the ocean, on waterslides and in pools. For the price- I should have purchased this a long time ago instead of trying to protect my SLR from the water and sand. I have referred this to many friends - kids also have a great time with it.

Reviews.Title: Waterproof. Fair image quality.
Reviews.Author: kpha
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera specifically for a vacation. I did not at all submerge the camera under water but I did use it while I was in the pool and in close proximity to a waterfall. The images from this camera come out fairly brighter than a "land-only" camera so most of the subjects are washed out. I haven't had a chance to play with the settings but will do so before my next water adventure. For an underwater camera, I would recommend this to others however, I would use a different point and shoot camera for shooting on land.

Reviews.Title: solid value tough camera....
Reviews.Author: bikerunaz
Reviews.Content: I've had this camera for about a month and have been very pleased with it.  I have taken it mountain biking, kayaking, hiking, and several trail running events.  It was simple to set up, takes above average pictures, and is easy to move pictures to other devices (mostly my laptop computer).  I have not used it underwater and don't plan to.  I bought this camera to take with me during my outdoor adventures and didn't want to worry about sweat, rain, abuse (jarring from mountain biking).  So far it has met or exceeded all my expectations.  Overall, I believe it's a great value....you won't be disappointed.

Reviews.Title: Great photos; short life
Reviews.Author: Dave S
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera for a trip to Hawaii.  Snorkeling was going to be a priority and I wanted to be able to take underwater pictures.  This camera did the trick and took great pictures.  However, when we got out of the water and started our journey back to shore, I tried to turn the camera on to take some scenery shots and the camera wouldn't turn back on.  I planned to rinse the camera in fresh water when we got to shore but obviously I was too late.  I let the camera dry for over 2 days before opening the battery cover but it still wouldn't turn on.I'll have to report on the warranty response from Panasonic when I send the camera back for repair.  Wish me luck.

Reviews.Title: Tough camera great pictures
Reviews.Author: Bloose
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for my 13 year old daughter who broke the previous 2 point and shoot digitals I bought her. I decided on this camera for two basic reason. First it isn't as expensive as some of the other "tough" cameras out there. The second is because this is in fact a "tough" camera.After going through 2 far more delicate cameras something that would withstand some abuse was far more important than most anything else.  This camera fit that bill just fine. It is well made and so far has held up fine to the use of a 13 year old girl. This is pretty much to be expected for a camera such as this. What wasn't exactly expected is the vast amount of nice features and the very nice pictures this camera takes. Lots of scene modes, a 4 times zoom, 16MP sensor, HD video, etc, all in a tough package for well under $200. This camera serves great as a nice point and shoot tool the requires far less concern than normal cameras, thus making it a great every day photo tool.B

Reviews.Title: Excellent Purchase
Reviews.Author: Jrad
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera specifically for my trip to Hawaii so I could take photos while snorkeling. This camera has now had any negative feedback from me. It does everything a point and shoot should. I don't doubt my purchase at all and would suggest to anyone looking for a simple camera that is shock and waterproof to get this camera!

Reviews.Title: great little camera!
Reviews.Author: honestreivew
Reviews.Content: Took this camera on vacation to Punta Cana and it worked amazing!Great for taking pictures underwater.You should buy the chum too so it floats.I used it in ocean and pool and even in a cavern.Very easy to use!  Not the best zoom but for takingwater pictures how far do you need to zoom?I loved it and recommend it to all

Reviews.Title: great camera, so far
Reviews.Author: doug
Reviews.Content: works as promised. I too it on a four day trip to the Bahamas and took hundreds of pics over the 4 days. We snorkeled each day and it worked great. Seal seems like it will last as long as you follow directions and keep it clean. I was only 6-10ft down but it takes great pics. For the money it was the best deal.

Reviews.Title: Everything it Says to Be
Reviews.Author: Avi
Reviews.Content: The camera is everything it says to be, within reasonable consideration.  Durable with all the features you would want.  It takes minimal time to power on and snap a picture so you won't miss the quick shots you were unprepared for.  The size is perfect, fits nicely into jeans pockets, and pretty much anywhere.  I think it is far and away the best camera in its class, especially considering the price.For a few complaints: I first took the camera surfing.  Paddling out, I tucked it into my wetsuit, and the waterproofing worked great.  However, as it stretched out my wetsuit, the second time I paddled out I simply strapped it onto my arm, outside the wetsuit.  This time there was water damage from paddling through the waves, and I had to return the camera for a new one.  I blame that on my own overly high expectations, not the camera itself.  As a minor concern, some of the buttons' names are wearing off after only 2 months use, but through plenty of wet usage.  Another complaint is that every time the camera turns on, a screen asks if you want to review the waterproof guidelines.  One touch of a button gets rid of this screen, but it is a bit annoying nonetheless.Overall, I think this camera is the best buy for anything in its class, there are no major concerns and I couldn't be happier!

Reviews.Title: My TS20 is great, but its blue color gets me as many compliments as my photos!
Reviews.Author: QuintBy
Reviews.Content: I love my TS20, which I bought brand new at $20 off even though it was listed under the "Refurbished" category. Apparently, Panasonic restricts Amazon from allowing non-official Panasonic product sellers to place their merchandise under the 'New' category. This camera has taken a beating so far and continues to deliver great pictures. I haven't gotten it totally underwater yet but it's gotten wet during whitewater rafting with no difficulties as a result.It may be considered trivial to some, but this camera in blue is both pretty and handsome an I get asked all the time where I got my 'blue camera.' That's actually how I came to find this TS20 in the first place after having seen one in blue in a department store. It's very outdoorsy, unlike the other 3 colors. Get one, and either wait for a sale or buy one of the 'refurbished' new units!

Reviews.Title: Great Camera!
Reviews.Author: Sharon
Reviews.Content: This is a great camera that I got for a steal on Amazon. I was looking for a waterproof camera for my Hawaii trip and I decided on this one because I read through a lot of the reviews on Amazon.Pro: Simple to use with basic instructions. Love the panoramic mode on this camera, much better than my Nikon Coolpix. The quality of the pictures came out well. The usage underwater was fantastic! Followed the instructions to soak in fresh water for 10 minutes after usage and the camera was good the next day. The battery last a whole day fully charged which I LOVE since its rechargable!Con: There's no view finder on this camera so you have to be careful not sticking your finger in front of the lens. While using the camera near water or out of the water, you have to make sure that you wipe the lens because if you don't then you will have a water drop in your photos.Overall I love this camera and it's my to go to camera now! Thanks Amazon for the great deal!

Reviews.Title: Alot of Camera for a GREAT Price!
Reviews.Author: mar381
Reviews.Content: I travel often and there isn't a time that I don't have a few different cameras, lenses in my possession. My son in law had purchased this camera for a trip to the boundary waters as a surprise for his wife.  When I saw it, read up on the features and the PRICE - I couldn't click "BUY" fast enough.  I thought, I need to get myself one and see what this little camera can actually do.I purchased it, unpacked it to make sure everything was in working condition, charged the battery & packed it for a trip I was leaving on the following day. We took it with us to the Yosemite National Park in Fresno, Ca and I'll tell you; the quality of pictures I was able to get were amazing. I loved the Panoramic option!All the little features this little camera has is incredible, quality of the photo's are amazing.  Although this camera is literally a point and shoot camera;  I suggest that if you do purchase one, read up on it a bit before hand so that you are aware of all it can do. I am certainly one satisfied customer.Closing comment: Buy it!  If you even want a few examples of photo's, I'll even go so far as to send you a few that is how pleased I am with this camera!Mary Hayes - mar381@aol.com

Reviews.Title: Great Little Camera!
Reviews.Author: Glewbart
Reviews.Content: So far so good with this little beauty of a camera.  It produces crisp and clear images and video.  Plus the underwater capability seems excellent.

Reviews.Title: Great Sport Camera
Reviews.Author: LexOrandi
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera to go on vacation where there was a good chance it could get wet and be exposed to the out of doors.  The camera passed the test in an excellent manner.  Part of my vacation was to go kayaking and anyone who has been in a kayak knows there is a great chance of getting wet.  The camera was wet many times and still took great pictures.  i was glad to have it for my trip.

Reviews.Title: love this camera
Reviews.Author: KellyS
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for an upcoming trip where I will need to use the underwater feature.  Brought this to the beach last week and it took fantastic pictures - much better than I thought it would (considering I was only going to use for snorkeling).  I fully intend to use this camera for everyday stuff as well.  Loved the burnt orange color - easy to see.  My only complaint would be the small buttons you need to press to view the pictures - I had to use my finger nail to really press it down.  My husband has big hands, so it didn't work too well for him.  I think I will get used to it.

Reviews.Title: Decent p&s;
Reviews.Author: Hunter
Reviews.Content: I bought this for a survival trip in the Utah wilderness. I normally shoot with a lumix gh2 but certainly wasn't going to bring that. This camera worked great. Quick boot time and focus. Great battery life. I do recommend this camera. Pics are decent especially if you're not an experienced photographer.

Reviews.Title: great point and shoot
Reviews.Author: wildrush
Reviews.Content: Love this camera. Had it for two weeks so far and already put it to the test. I purchased this camera since on our last vacation we had a bloggie camera that my wife loved and had almost all our vacation photos on it, when the day happened while at a water park we forgot the camera was  in the pocket and it took a swim.. not good. Killed the camera and since there's no memory card only a hard drive., we lost the photos as well. So here we are with this one wich not only Zooms beautifully but takes awesome photos, is easy to use and the rechargeable battery lasts a long time. I thought it was only water resistant but found to our surprise it works great under water as well and has a setting just for that, and much more. A great vacation camera. Looks nice easy to nav. And takes awesome pics . Best of all affordable!!!!

Reviews.Title: Great buy for $99 one day only deal!
Reviews.Author: mamaginabean
Reviews.Content: Have used it for 500 pics or so and some underwater use. Good point and shoot while we sort out our 6.5 yr old dSLR issues...

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: john a. leon
Reviews.Content: I am on the beach everyday when sea turtles are laying eggs.I am on the turtle patrol.Take a lot of pictures and other digital cameras I have had are always getting sand in the in and out of the lens.Also I get them wet with salt water.This camera solved those problems and is easy to operate and takes great picts

Reviews.Title: Awesome little travel camera!
Reviews.Author: NoSO
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera to take on our trip to Hawaii. I went shark diving while I was there and wanted underwater pics and video. The pic quality is great, the video came out wonderful. This is the perfect vacation camera. I am so glad I bought it!

Reviews.Title: Great little camera!
Reviews.Author: LZacc
Reviews.Content: So far, so good!  This camera did not disappoint.  Loved being able to capture memories of our family while at the beach.  Pictures while the kids were playing in the ocean are priceless, and the best part is we did not have to be concerned about the camera getting wet while the waves crashed around us.  Underwater pics are pretty good under sunny conditions; definitely better than disposable underwater cameras.  Great camera for the price!

Reviews.Title: Tough and lightweight
Reviews.Author: Tpan "TP"
Reviews.Content: Bought this to replace an Olympus Stylus 500 waterproof camera that finally died after several years of use in the out-of-doors. This camera is lightweight, has a rugged feel, has no battery-draining external lens, and it takes very good quality closeup and regular photos. It has a good set of features including image stabilization, and its waterproof, shockproof, dust proof and freeze proof construction makes it ideal for general outdoor use such as for hiking and fishing trips.other features of this camera are:- attractive design- bright orange color is makes it easy to locate in outdoor situations- lightweight, slim profile, durable construction- very good battery life- good quality photos- easy to use- reasonable priceSo far, I am very satisfied with this camera.

Reviews.Title: slim and waterproof
Reviews.Author: iworkout
Reviews.Content: All the other waterproof cameras are real thick (over an inch).  I think its fine to have GPS but I'm not about to pay an extra 100 dollars for that.  This camera is not only .75 inch thick, but it has great underwater shots.  I'm a swim instructor and I use it in my swim classes.  The parents and the kids get the biggest kick out of it.  I'm a backpacker and having a super small lightweight camera that can get wet and be dropped is a huge relieve.  And its the cheapest... how did the smallest become the cheapest.  win win.

Reviews.Title: Panasonic Lumix - Well worth the investment
Reviews.Author: S. Sander "Scott"
Reviews.Content: This camera is outstanding for the purposes it is promoted for...knocking around water likely places.  Hiking, waterfalls, beach, pool, rafting, etc.  Daughter took it to the beach and used it in both the pool and the ocean and deckside as well. Very easily adjusts to various shooting situations and does a wonderful job of minimizing the "blue" in underwater settings.  Images above and under water are crisp and offer good contrast. Respect the maintenance directions (cleansing off saltwater, and keeping the door track free of dust) and this camera will treat you mutually well!

Reviews.Title: Great Camera!
Reviews.Author: J
Reviews.Content: This camera is a great point and shoot camera that served me well on my vacation. It produced great scenery shots and also some pretty good underwater pictures in the nearby stream. Color and picture quality is higher that expected. Only downside is that the camera shows fingerprints easily, but if that is no big deal than this camera is perfect. I would recommend this camera for anyone who wants a great point and shoot camera for a reasonable price.

Reviews.Title: Clumsiness Solved
Reviews.Author: Mindy
Reviews.Content: I am a very active person and a very clumsy person. I beat this camera up on a recent trip to Florida and all I can say is that with everything I put it through it still took amazing pictures. It also takes amazing underwater photos. I have recommended this camera to many people and will continue to do so.

Reviews.Title: Decent Camera
Reviews.Author: Sensual Satine
Reviews.Content: I got mine from C*tco for more (and returned it - but bc it didn't meet my needs).I  do a lot of whitewater kayaking & wanted something inexpensive but decent to take along. I only used it on the river, so I can't compare other uses. I don't think I ever submerged it, but it got splashed a lot. The housing has a 2 part closure that makes it fairly idiot-proof for leaking.  Battery life was quite good but found charging more complicated than other cameras.Picture quality was okay - i had more issues with having something dry to wipe water off lens. Because of that, decided pics on river more trouble than worth and I'm now padding rivers that don't offer much time for pics.I'm used to a 15x zoom with my "real" camera, so the zoom on this camera just wasn't enough for my needs. I swtched to a 32g mem card bc the 8g filled up too fast (video-wise).The pics were clear enough. Sound on video was good. I found the buttons were a challenge to operate - ie switching btwn scene settings. Then again, I've dealt with some ridiculously bulky underwater camera housings diving... (If you search youtube "hikingdiva kayak hiawassee" you can see some footage for sound quality)If you want a camera that you can take to the beach & knock around - works fine.

Reviews.Title: Panasonic Lumix DMC-TS20P
Reviews.Author: Carol W. Rider
Reviews.Content: Bought this for a future trip to Australia and snorkeling at the Great Barrier Reef, but took it to Alaska on a tour and cruise this month. Several misty or rainy days gave me the opportunity to try it out.  Wonderful results.  Very happy with how easy it was used by both my husband and me, and we got some great pictures we might have not taken due to the conditions.  Great value for the cost and very easy to use as we also have other Lumix cameras with Intelligent Auto.

Reviews.Title: Sturdy, good controls, decent image quality.
Reviews.Author: Andris Rutins
Reviews.Content: The image is inferior to a DSLR, but that is to be expected. otherwise it does what it's supposed to do, even underwater.

Reviews.Title: used 2 times... and broke
Reviews.Author: livefree
Reviews.Content: Got this for a trip abroad... used it twice and then it broke.  If I could give it zero stars I would.

Reviews.Title: Not worth the money.
Reviews.Author: Sapana Jain
Reviews.Content: I bought this item in May 2012. It worked well till 1 year and in July 2013 it started giving an Error on the screen - System Error - Zoom. It was not even dropped or anything. I sent to the panasonic service center. They are telling me that lense component has stopped working and they have to replace the whole unit. Charge for replacing this Unit - almost as much as the camera cost !! I think it better to buy a costlier waterproof camera from Nikon or Olympus. Those camera's have better picture quality and at least if there is any problem repair cost would be nominal compared to this piece of garbage. This camera is not worth the money. I would strongly advice against it.

Reviews.Title: Not waterproof!
Reviews.Author: aj_18 "Aj_18"
Reviews.Content: I bought this 10 months ago. I followed the directions to a T and when I took it in the water....Water leaked in and ruined my camera. Thank goodness I had bought a protection plan for it otherwise I would be very unlucky here.

Reviews.Title: Stopped working after one year.
Reviews.Author: Matt Rubin
Reviews.Content: When I first bought this camera, it was great.  It took good pictures and did everything that I was hoping it would do.  But after one year, the camera will not power on.  I contacted Panasonic and they said that they would have to service it, but it would cost more than what I originally paid for the camera.  I would not recommend buying this camera.

Reviews.Title: Junk - Do not buy. Waste of money
Reviews.Author: Anonymous
Reviews.Content: Long story short, it broke after the second use in water. It was a normal day at the beach and I took it in the water to get some photos. I was in water no deeper than chest high. It worked fine for about half an hour. Hasn't worked since.After it broke I decided not to waste anymore time or money with Panasonic. So I went to the store and it was quite painful dropping $250 on a new replacement waterproof camera.Ever hear of Pavlov dogs? After my Lumix experience, everytime I see the word "Panasonic" I wince and then put my wallet away.

Reviews.Title: Blank LCD Screen...
Reviews.Author: James E Hawley
Reviews.Content: It worked great for the first couple weeks I used it. But now the screen is just blank, making it useless. Apparently it is not as waterproof as advertised. Pretty disappointing.

Reviews.Title: Do NOT buy this camera
Reviews.Author: Sunshine State
Reviews.Content: I have 2 Panasonic Lumix, so thought this is like other 2, reliable and last long.  I was wrong.  Since this is my first underwater camera, I followed all instructions to prevent any water damage on camera..... no matter what you do, water gets in.  I recently needed to replace the camera.  Thanks goodness it was before 1 yr warranty expires.  Panasonic provides great customer service.  If you get replacement, make sure you get new one otherwise it does not even last 90 days.  I guess I will be frequent flyer of replacing this camera over and over.  BTW picture quality is great, easy to use.

Reviews.Title: 1 out of 5 shots are in focus
Reviews.Author: Andreas L. Bazos
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera after having 2 Canon PowerShot cameras, and found that this thing can't not take a focused shot if it's life depended on it.  Also battery life is too short. After a year of owning this thing I am now giving up and going back to a Canon PowerShot.

Reviews.Title: Bad
Reviews.Author: x
Reviews.Content: I actually bought the camera from target after went over the reviews from amazon. Target has cheaper price. I tested it in he pool and it worked fine. Then brought to my Jamaica trip, the second day the camera died. I noticed that when I pressed the botton underwater I could see bubble come out of the camera, i guessed water was getting in at the moment. So it's not a good waterproof camera. I guess it might work ok in the swimming pool. It ruined my trip.

Reviews.Title: It will do
Reviews.Author: witz
Reviews.Content: I would have preferred a slightly larger camera in order to handle it more naturally;  this is too easy to fumble.

Reviews.Title: Panasonic Lumix TS20
Reviews.Author: psc
Reviews.Content: This camera is very nice and has been used under water many times without any problems. I wish they made a better lens for these type of point and shoot cameras but I don't believe they do. It doesn't work great under low light but probably as good as any with a fixed lens.

Reviews.Title: great camera!
Reviews.Author: Kornelia
Reviews.Content: I purchased for my fiance, right before our trip to Hawaii, and boy, we have some great pictures now! the fact that we could take picture under water is great!

Reviews.Title: Awesome for the price!
Reviews.Author: BETH FORD
Reviews.Content: I was a little hesitant to purchase this because the price.  Could it really be waterproof and be that low in price?...  Answer - YES!  I took many pictures underwater and well as underwater videos.  The quality is great and pictures are very clear.  People were extremely surprised how inexpensive this camera was.  Now that we are moving to Hawaii for 3 years, I am SO happy I purchased this.  It will get much use!

Reviews.Title: NOT waterproof
Reviews.Author: Lin in Minnesota
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera in December with the intent of taking underwater photos while snorkeling. I followed the directions exactly. I snorkeled for an hour and took photos. All seemed well. The camera was rinsed off and dried. I did not open the cover. I used it again the next day and pretty soon, there was fogging inside. I returned to shore, rinsed it and dried it off. Opened the cover and dried everything out. I could not use it for 3 days until it completely dried out. It would fog whenever I closed the cover. Used my iPhone camera in the mean time. I ended up having to put the camera in a waterproof bag that I bought for my phone. It was awkward to take photos through the bag but at least I got some nice photos. I will keep the camera just because it is nice to have a camera that can handle being used in the rain and dust but don't count on it to be waterproof. The picture quality was acceptable, not stellar. The screen was a bit dim even at its brightest setting.

Reviews.Title: I THOUGHT it was a good waterproof camera
Reviews.Author: James E. Baker "James Baker"
Reviews.Content: EDIT:  After only owning this camera for 7 months, it died.  We followed the instructions explicitly to avoid moisture getting into the camera.  Nonetheless, after taking several pictures underwater on our wedding trip, the camera's lens and screen fogged up.  Shortly after it died.  Not good behavior for a "waterproof" camera.  This was only in a 4 foot deep pool so it definitely was not a problem with going "too deep".---------------I am looking forward to bringing this camera to the pool in Mexico and going snorkeling with it. It is nice to bring out to parties/bars too because you don't have to worry about spills.  It doesn't take amazing picture but it's a good point and shoot. It would be nice if it had a telescopic zoom but that's probably not possible for waterproof cameras.All in all, I'm satisfied and would consider purchasing it again if needed.

Reviews.Title: Picture quality unnaceptable
Reviews.Author: geoff "user"
Reviews.Content: The picture quality was unacceptable. Plain and simple this camera should have never been made. Probably great for kids in a swimming pool or quick beach shots, but that is all.

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: Andrea Mendez
Reviews.Content: Good choice, excellent under water, landscapes and outdoors, great resolution.It has many different modes to take a pictures, and you can name your babies and pets!

Reviews.Title: OK
Reviews.Author: albeiro bedoya olmos
Reviews.Content: I LOVET IT IS GOOD I LOVET IT IS GOOD  FROM COLOMBIA YES I LOVET IT IS GOOD  FROM COLOMBIA YES I LOVET IT IS GOOD  FROM COLOMBIA YES I LOVET IT IS GOOD  FROM COLOMBIA YES I LOVET IT IS GOOD  FROM COLOMBIA YES I LOVET IT IS GOOD  FROM COLOMBIA YES

Reviews.Title: Excellent camera for vacations
Reviews.Author: Carlos Salazar
Reviews.Content: Good camera for vacations, you can use it anywhere, at sea, pool, beach, anywhere, the quality of the image is pretty good is not the best but is good, my old sony p-30 has better quality of image, not sure if it is mine or what happens but the photos look soft the sony that I used to have has better sharper quality.Also the panoramic function sucks, the quality of images is totally bad, they looked worst than my camera's cellphone. however the advantage to use this camera on extreme conditions makes it a good deal for vacations, you will enjoy it.

Reviews.Title: good enough for me
Reviews.Author: heidi
Reviews.Content: the camera allowed me to take pictures and videos while going on rides at water parks and hanging out in the pool and on beaches. very durable and well worth it.

Reviews.Title: Thank u
Reviews.Author: Colleen Hall
Reviews.Content: Thes best Camera in the world . . . . . . . . . . . . . .

Reviews.Title: Very nice for what it is.
Reviews.Author: Brandon Hellevang "-Brandon"
Reviews.Content: I normally shoot with a Canon 60D but wanted something to take on shore excursions for a cruise we went on. It served the purpose perfectly. Auto-mode seems pretty intelligent and the image quality is as good expected for a $130 camera - not on par with an SLR obviously but very respectable.

Reviews.Title: Poor choice
Reviews.Author: Jeff Geyer
Reviews.Content: Purchased the camera specifically for capturing snorkeling videos and pics in Kauai. My wife took three or four surfing pictures of me the first day. We gave it the proper cleaning according to the instructions and then took it out snorkeling the next day and it filled with water. I didn't even get to use it. Extremely disappointed in the "toughness". We did manage to salvage the SD card only to find out the actual picture quality was also lacking. The canon powershot we also own takes far better pictures with better color content. These seemed grainy and dark in low light shots especially. Will never buy a panasonic 'water proof' camera again.

Reviews.Title: Great for the money!
Reviews.Author: purpleskier
Reviews.Content: This is a nice little camera that takes great pictures!  We haven't tested it in water yet so i do not know about that feature.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Heather
Reviews.Content: This is a great camera! We use it in our dogwash so it is perfect! Has lots of amazing features!

Reviews.Title: Panasonic Lumix TS20
Reviews.Author: Tony  Rodríguez "Derito"
Reviews.Content: LA ENTREGA FUE SUPER RAPIDA Y EL PRODUCTO MAS QUE EXCELENTE, VINO SELLADA Y CON TODOS SUS ACCESORIOS Y MANUALES.

Reviews.Title: VERY GOOD AND 100% RECOMMENDED
Reviews.Author: JORGE LEON
Reviews.Content: MUY BUENO Y LLEGO EN EXCELENTE ESTADO ACA A VENEZUELA Y TAL Y COMO SE DESCRIBIA, MUCHA RESPONSABILIDAD DEL VENDEDOR ESTAMOS ENCANTADOAS CON EL PRODUCTO MUCHAS GRACIAS

Reviews.Title: Panasonic Lumix TS20 16.1MP TOUGH Waterproof Digital Camera with 4x
Reviews.Author: Rodd L. Ringquist
Reviews.Content: This is another product I bought for the bucket list, it has good revues, seems to be reasonably priced, I don't need it for underwater use but will be around water a lot according to my list, in which this would be a great plus. Will update after first trip!

Reviews.Title: too expensive
Reviews.Author: cappi
Reviews.Content: Have seen same camera much cheaper. . shop around this was way overpriced ....camera is ok but dont buy here

Reviews.Title: Defective camera
Reviews.Author: Cindy
Reviews.Content: Used the camera for a couple of days on land. It worked fine. We especially liked the panoramic feature. Then we took it on a cruise. We followed the directions for keeping the seal clean and making sure the door was closed and locked etc. After the first day of underwater use while snorkeling (about 30 min), the camera stopped responding.We followed the directions closely on cleaning the camera and allowing it to dry overnight. The next day, the camera still would not turn back on. We were not able to take any pictures for the rest of the trip. It was disappointing, to say the least!

Reviews.Title: Disappointed
Reviews.Author: BigRedLucy
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera both for its compact size and its tough, waterproof casing. The idea was to have as easily accessible camera to use while hiking and kayaking. I am far from a professional photographer but I was very disappointed in the picture quality. Why cameras with viewfinders are going the way of the woolly mammoth, I'll never know. The grainy LCD viewfinder was difficult to see in the sunlight both to frame your picture and then to see what the picture you took looked like. Still, I could live that. However, this is supposed to be a point and shoot camera, none of the settings on the camera resulted in good picture quality. After using the camera to take a few hundred pictures and finding myself disappointed when I uploaded the pictures to my computer, I decided to return the camera. It's not good when your phone takes better pictures than a device that is specifically made to take pictures. I'll keep looking and likely go to a Canon product; I've been happy with my old, bulky AE 80 Powershot so hopefully I will find a Canon compact camera that fits the bill.

Reviews.Title: Great camera, great value
Reviews.Author: Steve
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for a 3-day canoe trip, and it worked like a champ!  Very durable, and took great photos.  It has a great panorama feature which basically takes a 10-second video as you pan across, then it seamlessly makes one large panorama, negating the need for manual alignment of pictures like with older cameras. Quality is superb, just make sure to wipe and water droplets off the lens before taking shots!

Reviews.Title: ehh
Reviews.Author: skyler
Reviews.Content: The camera worked great came with the case like it said but it also said was gonna come with a memory card which i never got

Reviews.Title: Great Point & Shoot waterproof camera
Reviews.Author: JackC
Reviews.Content: I use this camera while kayaking in both whitewater and flatwater. Since I usually do several rolls(practice or combat)while kayaking, the camera's waterproof feature get tested everytime I paddle, which is usually several times a week.

Reviews.Title: Great little camera
Reviews.Author: John Henry "Agent Henry"
Reviews.Content: The Panasonic Lumix Underwater Camera is a good deal and reasonably priced.  The camera is very easy to use, the software included makes you into a "PROFESSIONAL".  We are very happy with our purchase.

Reviews.Title: Great product, super price
Reviews.Author: Debbie Bretag "runner girl"
Reviews.Content: My Kayak trip on Lake Superior was the first test for this camera. It held up very well and took some nice underwater photos.  It is easy to use, though I need to learn more about some of the features.

Reviews.Title: excellent compact camera
Reviews.Author: Leonardo Cohen
Reviews.Content: This camera has an excellent design, it is compact and produces very good photos and videos. The ability to go under water is a nice addition besides the super compact size. Its body is super small and metal, what is excellent compared to so many plastic ones around. Optical system, by Leica is, as usual, top notch.Highly recommended!

Reviews.Title: Takes very good photos
Reviews.Author: Happy Times
Reviews.Content: Works very well for a small point and shot.I love it can put it in your pocket and take it any where.warns you if not sealed so you know it's ok to get it wet. Settings are easy to use. I love it.

Reviews.Title: Excellent ULTRA COMPACT - top quality pocket/waterproof camera!!
Reviews.Author: jbt
Reviews.Content: GREAT CAMERA.I am a critical person on cameras and many do not meet my expectations.This has the best size of any, the best quality of any and is simple.I have and still own about every panasonic camera ever made - always the best models in the group - such as the big brother to this the ts3 and ts4 and the awesome tz10 [zs7]. I have always put pana cameras at the top and this one too fits its niche perfectly.It doesnt have all the features of the ts4 like GPS, 4x vs 5x zoom, super high speed shooting or full HD video or 40ft depth. BUT i almost never used any of those items anyways - although nice to "have" but for the ULTRA small size you can't beat it. it is WAY better and faster than any olympus tough camera, better than the pentax wg1 wg2 rugged's - better than the sony one too.for the price - you can't ask for more - even if it costs $100 more - it is just a great to have with you all the time camera that works awesome in water for snorkeling. if you're a diver then NONE of the water cams will work anyways and you'll need a real housing, etc. but for the 99.999% this fits all you need.

Reviews.Title: Great size an pics
Reviews.Author: Arlene P. White
Reviews.Content: Received promptly and as expected. Always in my purse to catch those special moments. Haven't tested it's ruggedness but plan to on upcoming Mongolia trip!  High expectations since I have had several Lumix cameras over the years.

Reviews.Title: Works like a charm
Reviews.Author: Happy momma
Reviews.Content: I purchased 4 different brands of waterproof cameras this summer and they all failed within 10 days. I gave up and thought I will buy one next summer after extensive research. One morning I received a GOLD DEAL email about the Panasonic TS20 on sale for 99.00.  I purchased it based on the good reviews and I'm so glad I did.  I had this camera in the pool, at the beach, in the rain and in a pond. It takes amazing pictures in and out of the water. The pictures are crisp and video is sharp. I definitely would recommend this camera!!!

Reviews.Title: Exceptional
Reviews.Author: Gabriel aybar
Reviews.Content: I feel rally thankful because it overpass my expectations and the best part is that is an excellent product in a very low price

Reviews.Title: Good rough and tumble camera
Reviews.Author: mailkirsten
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera specifically to use at the pool, beach, camping, and playing outdoors with the kids.  It's a decent camera for those purposes.  I love that it can get wet and take a bit of a beating.  Outdoor daylight pics are nice and bright and clear.  Indoor pics with flash are iffy. Some are decent and some are blurry, patchy and washed out.  Zoomed pics are a bit grainy.  I got this camera as a Amazon daily deal so the price was good.  If I'd paid full price I'm not sure I'd keep it.  I'll keep it to use for wet pics, but will use my Canon digital ELPH or Canon DSLR other times.

Reviews.Title: Great camera for the price
Reviews.Author: Rick1
Reviews.Content: Works great under water, have not checked its shock absorbing durability. 16 MP, waterproof for under 200 bucks, great camera

Reviews.Title: Excellent camera for the price!
Reviews.Author: Ben
Reviews.Content: I purchased this little camera for my girlfriend for her upcoming trip to Costa Rica, and to replace one previously eaten by her dog. I was in the market for a compact waterproof, "lifeproof" camera, but didn't want to fork out $400.00. This Lumix TS20 did the trick! It's simple to use right out of the box, fits well in the hand and takes great pictures for the price.Pros:-Price, price, price-Ease of use-Build quality/attractive camera body-Nice color choice selection-Includes cleaning kit to keep camera seals and lenses in good working condition-Takes great pictures underwaterCons:-Menu can be hard to read in bright light-Menu and settings can be difficult to navigate and the set up is not very intuitiveOverall I'd say this is a great buy for the price. The few "cons" I came up with can easily be overlooked when taking into account the price point that this camera is set at.

Reviews.Title: Great for some fun
Reviews.Author: Stefanie
Reviews.Content: This camera is great if you're looking for something durable and waterproof to have some fun with.  I have a DSLR, but it's huge and inconvenient to take camping, hiking, and forget about taking it swimming!  You can't expect the BEST quality pictures from a camera like this, but I am VERY happy with the quality.  It's a very user-friendly camera, and I haven't had any problems with it.I just took it on a hike last weekend and got stuck in pouring rain... nice not to panic over the camera!If you're really active, love taking pictures, and like easy to use technology, this is a great camera for you!  I would highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera for the price
Reviews.Author: Lou Fabrizio
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my wife to use while kayaking.  As long as you're not too far away, the picture quality is quite acceptable.  Its a tough little camera and takes great underwater videos also.  We're more than happy with it.  as I said  though its best for close up snapshots than for panoramic views.

Reviews.Title: Fabulous Camera!
Reviews.Author: Anonymous
Reviews.Content: This camera was the one I decided to buy; compared to the Olympus Tough and the Kodak Easyshare Sport. I took it to California for 2 weeks and took about 800 pictures. I was pleasantly suprised by how clear the pictures turned out even if it was just a quick picture while walking. I used it on the beach, on the beach mode, and while it didn't go underwater with me all the pictures turned out amazing. I would definitly recommend this camera as it is easy to work and very durable. The only downside was that on the beach at night I think the lens was dirty and it looks like it is snowing in the pictures, but that did not bother me. This is a great camera that i would highly reccomend.

Reviews.Title: Panasonic Lumix TS20 16.1 MP
Reviews.Author: kzerbi
Reviews.Content: I love it!  For me, it's a great camara for a great klutz.  I have accidentaly spilled water on it, it fell off the bed, my dog had it in his mouth and it still works great!  It is not professional grade maybe, but perfect for good vacation photos, especially the adventurous type.  Follow the care instructions and it will take decent pictures.  My only regret is that it does not have a better optical zoom, but this was a great purchase for price and quality.  It also works with PC and Macs and since I used both for my scrapbooking and video upload, it was perfect.

Reviews.Title: Worked pretty well
Reviews.Author: Gurumustuk "gmustuk"
Reviews.Content: Got this camera for vacation in Mexico and used it the whole time for ocean, pool and snorkeling. Picture quality was ok for this price, but would have hoped for a bit more. Not ideal for low light. Overall for $110 it's a good deal and what I expected. It's easy to record videos and pictures with separate buttons.

Reviews.Title: Lumix
Reviews.Author: J. Durkin
Reviews.Content: Nice little camera & you don't have to worry about it getting wet.  I have not used it under water yet. Picture and video quality is good.

Reviews.Title: Question for other users...
Reviews.Author: ben

} } } Length:: 0:23 MinsOverall, I really like this camera, but...When I take Video (or pictures) in bright areas where the camera either catches the reflection of the sun from the water or you look at the sun directly, I see green vertical bars on the LCD and resulting picture/video. I uploaded a sample video from the camera to this review.(please leave a comment or write a review stating whether or not your camera has this same issue)I've tried resetting the camera to make sure it wasn't a bad setting by me, but it still does it.Wondering if anyone else has this issue... if not, I'll look at exchanging it for another one.But again... for the price (and even with the issue described above), fun camera :)(Note: Normally I'd just exchange the product and try again in this kind of scenario, but Best Buy (where I got the camera) is currently out of stock both in store and online... so, all I can do there is return the camera. If it's an issue with all DMC-TS20 cameras, I'll keep mine. If not, I'll return and look elsewhere for the same model).Thanks!

Reviews.Title: Radical Red Camera
Reviews.Author: dormond
Reviews.Content: Definitely a good little camera. Spent hours in a pool and used it all day. It made it through a vegas trip, still alive and snapping photos. Also took this camera to a lake. The camera is a trooper. It's responsive and intuitive. Only problem I have with the camera is that the zoom takes forever... I would suggest others to purchase this if you're looking for a compact waterproof/shockproof camera.

Reviews.Title: So far so good
Reviews.Author: Katy-did "KAZ"
Reviews.Content: Held up in the pool and on the beach on our recent FL vacation. Pictures are clear and good battery life. Afraid to give it 5 stars because our other water camera died after a second water test a few months after purchase. This is a different brand and has less moving parts. Think it's better choice.

Reviews.Title: Phenomenal All Around Camera
Reviews.Author: Exteme Outdoors
Reviews.Content: This camera is a fantastic point and shoot camera. I've used it extensively for the past month underwater, on trails, though mud, and just about every other extreme condition you can think of. It's held up well. The only drawback is super close shots and super far away shots are not perfect. Overall this camera is well worth it for the price you pay.

Reviews.Title: LOVE THIS CAMERA!
Reviews.Author: Gwen
Reviews.Content: I work at an electronics store and when I got to play with the camera I knew I had to have it, but in a different color. It is small, easy to put into my purse, water proof for the beach, and most of all shock proof. I drop things constantly. The images are awsome. Employees were running in the store and it made them look like they were standing still. It was raining ourside and the quality of the photos is clear as can be. The mode options are nice, over all I am happy with my purchase.Only downside I have, it does NOT come with a memory card.

Reviews.Title: Running the Green Rvr
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "=---v---=  :))!"
Reviews.Content: I bought the Panasonic Lumix TS20 16.1 MP TOUGH Waterproof Digital Camera with 4x Optical Zoom (Red)for a float trip down the Green River in Dinosaur NM. The zoom was handy for folks and scenery. Still foto quality is more than adequate for Picasa slide shows. I have not made prints. I shot video at 640 setting and the quality is marginal.No problem with it being watertight, tho I get a Caution to check the seal every time I close it. Once opened and closed again with caution all is ready to go. The camera was submerged to 1foot briefly and functioned flawlessly w/o any special care. Panasonic Lumix TS20 16.1 MP TOUGH Waterproof Digital Camera with 4x Optical Zoom (Red)

Reviews.Title: Died on the 2nd day of use
Reviews.Author: Yuliya
Reviews.Content: We bought this camera for the trip to Hawaii. It survived 1 day under water making good quality pictures. We followed all instructions for taking care of camera after use in a salt water.  Second day we used it for 15 minutes under water and the battery just died.  That was it, the camera never work again.

Reviews.Title: Not good for underwater
Reviews.Author: John
Reviews.Content: I purchased the camera 1.5 years ago.  We went on vacation last week 7/15/13.  This was the first time I took the camera in water it was at the Golden Nugget in Las Vegas and it destroyed the camera!

Reviews.Title: DO NOT BUY!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Christopher
Reviews.Content: Do not buy this camera if you intend on being near water. We lost all of our 15 year anniversary pictures while in Jamaica. We were sitting at the pool steps and the camera was submerged about three inches and it got water in it and ruined the SD card and stopped working. We have had it less than a year and over 200 of our second honeymoon pics were gone.  My wife is devistated and I am very aggravated to say the least.DO NOT BUY if you value your memories and hard earned money!!!

Reviews.Title: Eight days in running water... and it still works!
Reviews.Author: Elaine B.
Reviews.Content: We got this camera after my brother dropped my last one in a trout steam and broke it. When the inevitable happened and he dropped this one in the stream with this camera though, the current dragged it away, and he couldn't find it back. We wrote it off as a loss. Eight days later he went back to the same trout stream and found the camera, still fully submerged. We left it off for a week to dry out and lo and behold, the camera still works! The memory card wasn't even damaged and the c battery still had 66% power left. We were amazed. Good buy for an outdoorsman.

Reviews.Title: Stay away from this piece of junk !
Reviews.Author: Gocker V. "Dancing Corns"
Reviews.Content: Piece of junk.  Stay away from it as far as you can.  It was never in the water or near the water.  Took it my son's field trip 300 miles from home and the sucker died on me. Bought it in September 2012.  Arrrgggg. Apparently the CCW was the issue all along.  They knew it and would not fix.  I am going back to my reliable Canon. $139 down the toilet.  Never again Panasonic. I wish I could give it a negative 1 star.

Reviews.Title: It's a Hit or a Miss
Reviews.Author: april showers
Reviews.Content: This camera was very disappointing. The pic quality is horrible. Although pics looked good on the LCD screen, once I uploaded them they were washed out, blurry, etc. The underwater pics were a hit or a miss. Some taken above water, while in the water, had huge water droplets on the photos. The  pics taken on land in regular mode were about 75% of the time washed out.  About 25% of my photos came out nice. The pros of this camera is the panoramic feature and the durability of the camera.  Also very user friendly. But what good are these features if the pics do not come out good?  Out of 700 pics I recently took while in Costa Rica, on land and under water, I have about maybe 100 that are good color, lighting, clarity, etc.  I would NOT recommend this camera and would return it but I have missed my window of return time.  If you wish to contact me about product do so at rainydaze5@yahoo.com

Reviews.Title: Spartan Approved!
Reviews.Author: BillKilla
Reviews.Content: Some of my family and friends decided to enter the 2012 Spartan Sprint in Pennsylvania.  I wanted to take a waterproof and rugged camera with me while running the course.  After reading reviews of other products, I decided to purchase this particular camera.From start to finish, this camera held its own with the course.  After countless drops on the rocky terrain and plenty of time spent in muddy pond water, the camera survived unscathed and performed flawlessly through every obstacle the course could throw at it. AHOO!

Reviews.Title: Good underwater camera
Reviews.Author: A. Perry
Reviews.Content: YOU MUST FOLLOW THE INSTRUCTIONS AND TAKE CARE OF THIS CAMERA IF YOU WANT IT TO REMAIN WATERPROOF.That said, I really liked this camera.  I brought it with me on a trip to Mexico, where I had anticipated taking a lot of underwater photos of fish and things.  Spent most of the time on the beach, however, and not snorkeling or anything.  I did take a few underwater photos, but the water was too murky to really see anything too well (this was around the time of the hurricane in August 2012).  The pictures were often a little overexposed, I thought, in beach mode, and nighttime mode wasn't my favorite, but in general my photos were good.When I first tested the camera, it was in the resort pool.  I did look at the rubber piece that keeps it waterproof, and used the brush to wipe away some lint that I noticed on a very close inspection.  It's annoying, yes, but it's worth taking care of if you are planning on using it for water photos or near water.You do need to be very very particular with this camera; I also noticed that some of my photos came out with a "blob" on the picture where there was a water droplet left on the lens.Overall, it's a decent camera, and I will be using it as my main digital camera from now on.  The features are pretty cool, although I don't understand the need for TWO baby settings (I'm also not a mother, though).

Reviews.Title: Broke on my first use
Reviews.Author: What?
Reviews.Content: I bought the Panasonic TS20 for a trip to the Galapagos Islands and it broke during the trip! It did fine the first week but the second week, it was dropped from about 2 feet and immediately stopped working. i bought the camera specifically for underwater, landscape and wildlife photos in the GALAPAGOS ISLANDS. Needless to say, I was more than upset. Thank goodness for my iphone that took some pretty decent shots. Anyway, when I returned home I immediately sent it to Panasonic to fix. Instead of fixing the camera, they sent me a new Panasonic Dmc-TS4 without explanation. I appreciated the new camera but why not send me the same model? Makes me think they may not have confidence in their own camera. Bottom line, the camera is light and attractive with a good price but didn't live up to it's "shockproof" tagline.

Reviews.Title: Panasonic Waterproof Camera
Reviews.Author: CarolePat
Reviews.Content: This is a great little camera. Takes really nice pictures and the waterproof feature came in very handy when we were out on the lake with my grandsons. The optional float makes sure the camera doesn't sink so I let  them snap away to their hearts content. They got some very interesting shots. And I love the fact that it's small enough to carry around in my purse.

Reviews.Title: Loved it until it died after its first real water use
Reviews.Author: Ashmac8
Reviews.Content: Received this camera as a Christmas present in anticipation of a cruise this summer.  Used it a few times but not submerged in water to test it out.  After using it in and out of the water the first time in Barbados, the seal appears to have stop working despite following all directions.As a result, the lense is constantly fogging up both in and out of the water.  I planned to use this camera as my secondary camera and leave my larger DSLR on the ship.  I really missed out on tons of photos on the rest of the cruise because I couldnt keep the lens from fogging up all the time.Tried panasonic customer service.  Without a receipt they will do a repair analysis for more cost than was originally paid for the camera.  :(Very poor service.  This is the second panasonic camera I've had that quit working properly in less than 18 months ownership.  Now on to shop for a new underwater camera.

Reviews.Title: Original pictures
Reviews.Author: Melito
Reviews.Content: I really like it, because it provides me to take unforgettable pictures that are great and unussual one, it in fact take pictures into water and it is anti falls,also in this color is full of fun

Reviews.Title: Picture is OK, video is so so
Reviews.Author: Andrew
Reviews.Content: Just use this camera under water, everything is fine. Picture are clear, just the video is so so. But anyway this item is satisfy me.

Reviews.Title: Panasonic Lumix TS20
Reviews.Author: Ann
Reviews.Content: Love this little camera.  Tucks into my purse so I am always ready for that perfect photo.  Easy to use and photos are great.

Reviews.Title: Great little Underwater Camera for the Price..
Reviews.Author: Edward A. Rutherford "Ed"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera to use in the pool and take some pictures of the young ones underwater.  The camera took some great pictures and exceeded my expectations for image quality under water.  No problem with leakage and very good low light shots in the deep end.  I even shot a several small videos of underwater summersaults.  This is a no brainer for the price and the versatility of the camera.  Even if it last one season I will be happy but it comes with a one year warranty and the camera appears to be well made.  Panasonic makes an excellent camera, they add a good lens, image stabilization and a very good processing engine for minimal noise in daylight shooting.  How can you go wrong on this one?

Reviews.Title: good outdoor camera for the price
Reviews.Author: NC Enthusiast
Reviews.Content: It's not super expensive so you won't be too heartbroken when you lose it off the side of a mountain.  Decent camera.  Biggest disappointment was in the burst mode.  My last Lumix had an awesome burst mode, and captured EVERYTHING.  This one is much slower so you miss a lot in between.  I don't regret buying it, though.  I've gotten a lot of good outdoor shots in water, dirt, and sand.

Reviews.Title: Very good and cheap
Reviews.Author: J. Lai "JL"
Reviews.Content: This camera was for my daughter to use in the swimming pool. So far, it is great and she hasn't broken it yet which is great, she usually breaks all of her cameras quickly. It is also very easy to use and produces good enough pictures for the price.

Reviews.Title: Excellent!!
Reviews.Author: Pablonarjo
Reviews.Content: This is an excellent camera for great price, it has been wet a few times without any problem, the size is perfect very good zoom and video recording is very easy with this specific button at the top so can be changed from photographs to video with just one button

Reviews.Title: Fun, Small, Tough with Decent Image Quality
Reviews.Author: John P. Mccormack
Reviews.Content: Update May 25, 2014. I took the TS-20 to the Galapagos Islands where it promptly failed (will not power ON) even before using it. I thought the battery (OEM Panasonic not 3rd party) was discharged, but when I put it in the charger the charging light flashes off and on in a green color. I may replace the battery as it's worth $10. to maybe get the camera working again.Bottom Line: You can take this camera anywhere in any conditions and get decent images.I purchased the TS20 when the orange model was on a special offer for $99.Impressions so far:- The image quality is pretty good, but it falls off pretty fast above ISO 200. Use it in good light.-At 5.01 ounces this is a tiny camera but the handling is pretty nice, though I've not used it underwater yet. It  measures 101 x 58 x 19 mm (3.98 x 2.28 x .75").- The maximum aperture is only f/3.9 at the wide end.- Screen quality is good, typical for most Panasonic cameras.- There are no P-A-S-M modes and no mode dial. I don't mind; this is a point shoot camera and the dials would compromise the weather seals.- Weather sealing seems okay, but again I've not used it underwater yet.- Exposure compensation is available and it's worth underexposing (-1/3 to -2/3rds) sensor in bright light.- Macro range is not great - 5 cm (1.97"), but with the 16MP sensor you can crop and still get huge images.- Flash range is 4.4 meters.More specs are listed on DPreview.com, but they are not complete for all features (They don't list the Underwater mode.)[...]

Reviews.Title: For lumix TS20
Reviews.Author: Temma Deguchi
Reviews.Content: Best fit for panasonic TS20.But it is not good design to hold snap.too easy open and afraid of dropping camera.

Reviews.Title: Durable
Reviews.Author: Krissy
Reviews.Content: Purchased this camera for a young man. It is durable and has kept up with him. Have not tested the waterproof feature.  I like that the camera can take pictures in rapid succession and the pictures have been turning out great.

Reviews.Title: great worry free camera
Reviews.Author: tvaclavek "tol1l1yboy"
Reviews.Content: For the price this camera is unbeatable. The images aren't dslr quality but you shouldn't be buying this thinking that is what you are getting. If you are in the market for a worry-free life-proof camera this little camera is the ticket .  The only disappointment I had Wada that I had read that it did her in camera and as far as I can tell it doesn't. I've taken it in the eater several times now and itwworks perfectly!

Reviews.Title: Buena Camara
Reviews.Author: Ramc Vzla
Reviews.Content: Relación Precio / Producto . Muy Buena Camara, cumplió con mis expectativas , Sencilla de usar  y  buena calidad en las Fotos

Reviews.Title: Awful Camera
Reviews.Author: talewis
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera to take on vacation.  I opened the package and set the camera up.  The next time I turned it on none of the buttons worked and it kept showing the precaution screen over and over again.  I contacted Panasonic for help and they never responded!  I have now missed all my family memories of this vacation.

Reviews.Title: very good!!!
Reviews.Author: jonathan
Reviews.Content: is all as describe in the product description. good quality photos...... GOOD Camera!and very cheap toI apply a product anti water for more protection just in case, you never know!

Reviews.Title: great camera to watch people poop
Reviews.Author: C. Baima "takedownchris"
Reviews.Content: got this on a lighting deal for 100$ or so found this to be great this summer as it is water proof.  so now i can put it in the toilet and take pictures of people pooping

Reviews.Title: just bougth it
Reviews.Author: trivial
Reviews.Content: for now i'm very happy,this camera look like others not bigger not smaller, she takes good pictures, i did'nt try the underwater until now.

Reviews.Title: gosh darn it.
Reviews.Author: Sherry Williams
Reviews.Content: It's a Christmas gift and has not yet been given to the intended person to use.  This rating review spoiled the surprise and I am bummed out by it.

Reviews.Title: Great shots, can't connect to MAC
Reviews.Author: mykad
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera last week.  It takes great photos and videos, normal and underwater.  The problem is that when I open the door to connect the USB cable, the camera won't turn on to upload photos to my computer.  Panasonic service is of no help whatsoever.  They say when you plug it into the computer, it should start automatically.  I think that would probably work if it would turn on with the USB cable plugged in!  They have no answer, so I'm stuch with a camera full of photos and videos I can't share with anyone.  DON'T BUY THIS CAMERA!

Reviews.Title: Please Help
Reviews.Author: Scooterpej
Reviews.Content: Hi, I just recieved my Panasonic Lumix TS20 and love it! The durability is awesome and the pictures come out quite well, can't wait to bring it on my cruise next week. However I did not receive the "free SD card" does it come separately? Any help would be great!

Reviews.Title: it may be waterproof but not milkproof
Reviews.Author: Brian McGrath the Carny
Reviews.Content: greetings fellow amazonians I purchased this because my last camera was broken due to some unspeakable acts by my neighbors. When this arrived I walked around my carnival taking pictures of all the sights so I could send it back to my mom. Halfway through the canival I was stopped by my boss who wanted me to work the dunk tank tonight. The normal guy had come down with some nasty virus and couldn't get out of bed.  I said sure since I had never done it before and went over and waited for the carnival to open. Unlike most places this carnival doesn't use water in its dunk tank but milk. My boss is pretty cheap so I am sure that this is what happens to all the milk that isn't sold by the sale date at the grocery store. Anyhoo it was showtime so I put my camara in my pocket and got up on the platform so the first rube could throw at me I noticed how weird the milk looked.  We are in texas right now and this it is hot and old milk does not hold up well in these conditons so as the rube started throwing at me I couldn't consentrateon anything , but the nasty milk. As i sat up their the smell started permiating me down to the cellular level. Even before a rube could knock me into the milk I felt weak and bent over and threw up into the tank then I passed out and fell in. Next think I know I awake back in my trailer with the knifethower's assistant putting a cold compress on my head. She said that I had almost drowned the the fireeater had comeover and saved me before it was too late. I then reached in my pocket and found my camara. The chunks of milk had seeped in through the camara lens and it gave everything a cloudy look to it. So please do not use this around any spoiled milk products or you may be in for some trouble

Reviews.Title: Child's Toy
Reviews.Author: A. Biswas "Anna B"
Reviews.Content: I am just going to come out and call this a child's camera. The fact that it is shock and water proof is one reason why.Second reason: for the money that you are about to dish out, the zoom on this camera is a joke. Your very own eyes can see farther than the maximum zoom on this toy (it goes 3.3 feet max).

Reviews.Title: DO NOT BUY
Reviews.Author: Valerie
Reviews.Content: After reading many reviews about different underwater cameras/shock proof cameras, and seeing that this was listed as one of the top ten waterproof cameras of 2012, I though this would be a great buy for the price!Unfortuantely I purchased this for our honeymoon, to take with us. As I was fumbiling around in the parking lot with the camera, clumsy me droped the camera from arms height onto the cement. As I went to pick up the camera there is a crack across the screen.This camera is NOT shock proof! Do NOT BUY! I am extremely disapointed and it was a waste of money. Now of course it is no longer water proof.Look else wear for a shock proof, water proof camera, this one is not!
